sieglinde.name: Sieglinde

fortify_dragons.name: Fortify Dragons

carrot_axe.description:

falchion.name: Falchion
falchion.description:

If unit initiates combat, unit cannot make a

follow-up attack. If unit’s Spd ≥ foe’s Spd+3 and

follow-up attack. If unit’s Spd > foe’s Spd and foe

bow_exp_2.description:

gentle_dream.description:
Grants another action to target ally. Grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 and the following status
to target ally and allies in cardinal directions
of unit and target (excluding unit): "Unit can
move to a space adjacent to any ally within 2
spaces." (That turn only. Cannot target an ally
with Sing or Dance. This skill treated as Sing
or Dance.)

frightful_dream.name: Frightful Dream
frightful_dream.description:
$aGrants another action to target ally. Inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-3 and【Guard】on foes
in cardinal directions of unit and target through
their next actions. (Cannot target an ally with
Sing or Dance. This skill treated as Sing or
Dance.)

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

mirror_stance_3.name: Mirror Stance 3
mirror_stance_3.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+6 during
combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1
on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

atk_def_form_1.name: Atk/Def Form 1
atk_def_form_1.description:
Grants Atk/Def+X to unit during combat.
(X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

atk_def_form_2.name: Atk/Def Form 2

atk_def_form_3.name: Atk/Def Form 3

close_call_1.name: Close Call 1
close_call_1.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit initiates combat,
unit moves 1 space away after combat.

close_call_2.name: Close Call 2
close_call_2.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit initiates combat,
unit moves 1 space away after combat.

close_call_3.name: Close Call 3
close_call_3.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit initiates combat,
unit moves 1 space away after combat.

fortify_res_4.name: Fortify Res 4
fortify_res_4.description:
At start of turn, grants Res+7 to adjacent allies for
1 turn.

bellringer.name: Bellringer
bellringer.description:
When unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0
damage is dealt.)

bellringer+.name: Bellringer+
bellringer+.description:
When unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0
damage is dealt.)

tanngrisnir.name: Tanngrisnir
tanngrisnir.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Spd+3.
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
and/or extra movement granted by a skill like
Armor March or Armored Boots is active,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 and Special
cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack during
combat. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

minty_cane.name: Minty Cane
minty_cane.description:
$aWhen unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0
damage is dealt.)
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

minty_cane+.name: Minty Cane+
minty_cane+.description:
$aWhen unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0
damage is dealt.)
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

tannenbit.name: Tannenbit
tannenbit.description:
When unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0
damage is dealt.)

tannenbit+.name: Tannenbit+
tannenbit+.description:
When unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0
damage is dealt.)

snows_grace.name: Snow's Grace
snows_grace.description:
Neutralizes "effective against dragons" bonuses.
Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥
50%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat.
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

rally_atk_res+.name: Rally Atk/Res+
rally_atk_res+.description: Grants Atk/Res+6 to target ally for 1 turn.

daring_fighter_1.name: Daring Fighter 1
daring_fighter_1.description:
If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.
If unit's HP ≤ 40% and unit initiates combat, unit
can make a follow-up attack before foe can
counterattack.

daring_fighter_2.name: Daring Fighter 2
daring_fighter_2.description:
If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.
If unit's HP ≤ 60% and unit initiates combat, unit
can make a follow-up attack before foe can
counterattack.

daring_fighter_3.name: Daring Fighter 3
daring_fighter_3.description:
If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.
If unit's HP ≤ 80% and unit initiates combat, unit
can make a follow-up attack before foe can
counterattack.

threat_atk_res_1.name: Threat. Atk/Res 1
threat_atk_res_1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

threat_atk_res_2.name: Threat. Atk/Res 2
threat_atk_res_2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

threat_atk_res_3.name: Threat. Atk/Res 3
threat_atk_res_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a
foe, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit for 1 turn and
inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces
through their next actions.

def_res_gap_1.name: Def/Res Gap 1
def_res_gap_1.description:
At start of turn, grants Def/Res+1 to ally
with the highest Def+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

def_res_gap_2.name: Def/Res Gap 2
def_res_gap_2.description:
At start of turn, grants Def/Res+3 to ally
with the highest Def+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

def_res_gap_3.name: Def/Res Gap 3
def_res_gap_3.description:
At start of turn, grants Def/Res+5 to ally
with the highest Def+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

saintly_seraphim.name: Saintly Seraphim
saintly_seraphim.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit initiates combat,
deals damage = 25% of foe's Res. (Ignores
reductions to Res from Special skills.)

soul_of_zofia.name: Soul of Zofia
soul_of_zofia.description:
Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's
follow-up attacks or prevent unit's follow-up
attacks during combat. If unit's HP ≤ 75% and
unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack.

atk_spd_oath_1.name: Atk/Spd Oath 1
atk_spd_oath_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+3 to unit for 1 turn.

atk_spd_oath_2.name: Atk/Spd Oath 2
atk_spd_oath_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit for 1 turn.

atk_spd_oath_3.name: Atk/Spd Oath 3
atk_spd_oath_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit for 1 turn.

fortune_bow.name: Fortune Bow
fortune_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. At start of turn,
if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is
adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def/Res-5 on
that foe through its next action.

fortune_bow+.name: Fortune Bow+
fortune_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. At start of turn,
if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3 and that foe is
adjacent to another foe, inflicts Def/Res-5 on
that foe through its next action.

temari.name: Temari
temari.description:
$aAt start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Atk/Spd-5 on that foe through its next action.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

temari+.name: Temari+
temari+.description:
$aAt start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Atk/Spd-5 on that foe through its next action.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

imbued_koma.name: Imbued Koma
imbued_koma.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if Special is ready, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat and foe
cannot make a follow-up attack.

guardian_fang.name: Guardian Fang
guardian_fang.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, deals
damage = 70% of difference between stats.
(Maximum bonus of +7 damage. Combos
with Phantom Spd.) If unit's Spd > foe's Spd,
reduces damage from attacks during combat
and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding
Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage =
difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

new_foxkit_fang.name: New Foxkit Fang
new_foxkit_fang.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit's Res > foe's Res, deals damage = 70%
of difference between stats. (Maximum bonus
of +7 damage.) If unit's Res > foe's Res,
reduces damage from attacks during combat
and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding
Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage =
difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

open_the_future.name: Open the Future
open_the_future.description:
Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Def. Restores
HP = 25% of damage dealt.

distant_ward.name: Distant Ward
distant_ward.description:
If magic, staff, or dragonstone foe initiates
combat, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit during
combat and unit can counterattack regardless
of foe's range.

atk_spd_gap_1.name: Atk/Spd Gap 1
atk_spd_gap_1.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Spd+1 to ally
with the highest Atk+Spd total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

atk_spd_gap_2.name: Atk/Spd Gap 2
atk_spd_gap_2.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Spd+3 to ally
with the highest Atk+Spd total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

atk_spd_gap_3.name: Atk/Spd Gap 3
atk_spd_gap_3.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Spd+5 to ally
with the highest Atk+Spd total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

def_res_oath_1.name: Def/Res Oath 1
def_res_oath_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Def/Res+3 to unit for 1 turn.

def_res_oath_2.name: Def/Res Oath 2
def_res_oath_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Def/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

def_res_oath_3.name: Def/Res Oath 3
def_res_oath_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Def/Res+5 to unit for 1 turn.

cordelias_lance.name: Cordelia's Lance
cordelias_lance.description:
Inflicts Spd-2. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

rebeccas_bow.name: Rebecca's Bow
rebeccas_bow.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes.

corvus_tome.name: Corvus Tome
corvus_tome.description:
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against
colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.

larceis_edge.name: Larcei's Edge
larceis_edge.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd or
if foe's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4
to unit and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from
skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

balmung.name: Balmung
balmung.description:
Grants Spd+3. If foe initiates combat or if foe's
HP = 100% at start of combat, neutralizes
penalties on unit and grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5
to unit during combat.

earthly_g\u00e1e_bolg.name: Earthly Gáe Bolg
earthly_g\u00e1e_bolg.description:
Grants Def+3. In combat against an infantry,
armored, or cavalry foe, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on
foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses to Atk/Def
(from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during
combat.

flower_of_plenty.name: Flower of Plenty
flower_of_plenty.description:
Grants Res+3. Grants Atk/Res+3 to allies
within 5 rows and 3 columns centered on unit
during combat.

winds_of_silesse.name: Winds of Silesse
winds_of_silesse.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat.

sweet_dreams.name: Sweet Dreams
sweet_dreams.description:
Grants another action to target ally and grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 to target ally for 1 turn.
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on nearest foes
within 4 spaces of target ally through foes'
next actions. (Cannot target an ally with Sing
or Dance. This skill treated as Sing or Dance.)

imperial_astra.name: Imperial Astra
imperial_astra.description: Boosts damage by 40% of unit's Spd.

steady_posture_3.name: Steady Posture 3
steady_posture_3.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+6 to unit
during combat and inflicts Special cooldown
charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

spd_res_solo_1.name: Spd/Res Solo 1
spd_res_solo_1.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Res+2 during combat.

spd_res_solo_2.name: Spd/Res Solo 2
spd_res_solo_2.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Res+4 during combat.

spd_res_solo_3.name: Spd/Res Solo 3
spd_res_solo_3.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Res+6 during combat.

repel_1.name: Repel 1
repel_1.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit initiates combat,
foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

repel_2.name: Repel 2
repel_2.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit initiates combat,
foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

repel_3.name: Repel 3
repel_3.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit initiates combat,
foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

light_brand.name: Light Brand
light_brand.description:
Grants Def+3. If foe's Def ≥ foe's Res+5,
deals +7 damage.

mirage_falchion.name: Mirage Falchion
mirage_falchion.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Grants Def+3.
If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's
Atk/Def during combat = 3 + number of allies
who have already acted × 2 (max value of 7).
If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's
Atk/Def during combat = 7 - number of foes
who have already acted × 2 (min value of 3).

mirage_feather.name: Mirage Feather
mirage_feather.description:
Effective against armored and cavalry foes.
Grants Spd+3. If unit initiates combat after an
ally has already acted, grants Atk/Spd+6 during
combat and unit can make a follow-up attack
before foe can counterattack.

mirage_axe.name: Mirage Axe
mirage_axe.description:
Grants Res+3. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Def/Res+6 to unit during combat
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

mirage_longbow.name: Mirage Longbow
mirage_longbow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Spd+3.
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, foe cannot
counterattack.

mirage_rod.name: Mirage Rod
mirage_rod.description:
Grants Atk+3. Inflicts Atk/Res-6 on foes within
2 spaces during combat.

blade_session_1.name: Blade Session 1
blade_session_1.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's
Atk/Spd during combat = 1 + number of allies
who have already acted (max value of 3).

blade_session_2.name: Blade Session 2
blade_session_2.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's
Atk/Spd during combat = 2 + number of allies
who have already acted × 2 (max value of 6).

blade_session_3.name: Blade Session 3
blade_session_3.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's
Atk/Spd during combat = 3 + number of allies
who have already acted × 3 (max value of 9).

shield_session_1.name: Shield Session 1
shield_session_1.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's
Def/Res during combat = 3 - number of foes
who have already acted (min value of 1).

shield_session_2.name: Shield Session 2
shield_session_2.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's
Def/Res during combat = 6 - number of foes
who have already acted × 2 (min value of 2).

shield_session_3.name: Shield Session 3
shield_session_3.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's
Def/Res during combat = 9 - number of foes
who have already acted × 3 (min value of 3).

spd_def_ruse_1.name: Spd/Def Ruse 1
spd_def_ruse_1.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Def-1 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd_def_ruse_2.name: Spd/Def Ruse 2
spd_def_ruse_2.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Def-3 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd_def_ruse_3.name: Spd/Def Ruse 3
spd_def_ruse_3.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Def-5 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

lull_atk_res_1.name: Lull Atk/Res 1
lull_atk_res_1.description:
Inflicts Atk/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Res (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk_res_2.name: Lull Atk/Res 2
lull_atk_res_2.description:
Inflicts Atk/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Res (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk_res_3.name: Lull Atk/Res 3
lull_atk_res_3.description:
Inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Res (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

deadly_balance.name: Deadly Balance
deadly_balance.description:
$aAt start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% or
if【Penalty】is active on unit, inflicts
Atk/Def-5 on foe and grants Special cooldown
charge +1 per foe's attack during combat.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.
Special cooldown charge granted even if foe's
attack deals 0 damage.)

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

laslows_blade.name: Laslow's Blade
laslows_blade.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to target or
targeting ally and allies within 2 spaces of unit
and target or targeting ally for 1 turn after
movement. (Excludes unit.)

devil_axe.name: Devil Axe
devil_axe.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat,
but if unit attacked, deals 4 damage to unit
after combat.

jakobs_tray.name: Jakob's Tray
jakobs_tray.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

fathers_tactics.name: Father's Tactics
fathers_tactics.description:
At start of combat, if unit's Res > foe's Res,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

melee_bouquet.name: Melee Bouquet
melee_bouquet.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

melee_bouquet+.name: Melee Bouquet+
melee_bouquet+.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

thorn_lance.name: Thorn Lance
thorn_lance.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if unit's Atk > foe's Atk,
inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during combat and foe
cannot make a follow-up attack.

scepter_of_love.name: Scepter of Love
scepter_of_love.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if a bonus
granted by a skill like Rally or Hone is active
on unit or if unit's HP ≥ 70%, grants bonus to
unit's Atk = 25% of foe's Def and inflicts
penalty on foe's Atk = 25% of foe's Res
during combat.

budding_bow.name: Budding Bow
budding_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates
combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat and
foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

budding_bow+.name: Budding Bow+
budding_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates
combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat and
foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

rapport_wand.name: Rapport Wand
rapport_wand.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+3 to ally with
the highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

rapport_wand+.name: Rapport Wand+
rapport_wand+.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+5 to ally with
the highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

threat_atk_def_1.name: Threat. Atk/Def 1
threat_atk_def_1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

threat_atk_def_2.name: Threat. Atk/Def 2
threat_atk_def_2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

threat_atk_def_3.name: Threat. Atk/Def 3
threat_atk_def_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a
foe, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit for 1 turn and
inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces
through their next actions.

rouse_spd_res_1.name: Rouse Spd/Res 1
rouse_spd_res_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Res+2 to unit for 1 turn.

rouse_spd_res_2.name: Rouse Spd/Res 2
rouse_spd_res_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

rouse_spd_res_3.name: Rouse Spd/Res 3
rouse_spd_res_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.

guard_lance.name: Guard Lance
guard_lance.description:
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per
attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

guard_lance+.name: Guard Lance+
guard_lance+.description:
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per
attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

constant_dagger.name: Constant Dagger
constant_dagger.description:
$aGrants Spd+3. If unit initiates combat, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat. If unit initiates
combat and is within 2 spaces of support
partner, foe cannot counterattack and unit and
support partner swap spaces after combat.
(If unit is within 2 spaces of more than one
support partner, swap does not occur.)
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

frost_breath.name: Frost Breath
frost_breath.description:
Grants Res+3. At start of turn or when Play is
used, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on closest foe
within 4 spaces of unit through their next
action. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage
using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

play.name: Play
play.description:
Grants another action to target ally. (That turn
only. Does not stack. Cannot target an ally
with Sing or Dance. This skill treated as Sing
or Dance.)

spd_res_form_1.name: Spd/Res Form 1
spd_res_form_1.description:
Grants Spd/Res+X to unit during combat.
(X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

spd_res_form_2.name: Spd/Res Form 2

spd_res_form_3.name: Spd/Res Form 3

even_pulse_tie_1.name: Even Pulse Tie 1
even_pulse_tie_1.description:
At start of even-numbered turns, if any foe's
HP+5 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is
ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe
with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot
exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

even_pulse_tie_2.name: Even Pulse Tie 2
even_pulse_tie_2.description:
At start of even-numbered turns, if any foe's
HP+3 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is
ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe
with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot
exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

even_pulse_tie_3.name: Even Pulse Tie 3
even_pulse_tie_3.description:
At start of even-numbered turns, if any foe's
HP+1 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is
ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe
with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot
exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

pegasus_flight_1.name: Pegasus Flight 1
pegasus_flight_1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-7,
inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat
= 30% of difference between Res stats
(unit’s Res minus foe’s Res) before combat.
(Maximum penalty of -3.)

pegasus_flight_2.name: Pegasus Flight 2
pegasus_flight_2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-7,
inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat
= 40% of difference between Res stats
(unit’s Res minus foe’s Res) before combat.
(Maximum penalty of -5.)

pegasus_flight_3.name: Pegasus Flight 3
pegasus_flight_3.description:
At start of combat, if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-7,
inflicts penalty on foe's Atk/Def during combat
= 50% of difference between Res stats
(unit’s Res minus foe’s Res) before combat.
(Maximum penalty of -7.)

atk_def_ruse_1.name: Atk/Def Ruse 1
atk_def_ruse_1.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Def-1 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk_def_ruse_2.name: Atk/Def Ruse 2
atk_def_ruse_2.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Def-3 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk_def_ruse_3.name: Atk/Def Ruse 3
atk_def_ruse_3.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Def-5 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

randgr\u00ed\u00f0r.name: Randgríðr
randgr\u00ed\u00f0r.description:
Effective against flying and armored foes.
Grants Atk+3. If foe's HP = 100% at start
of combat, neutralizes penalties on unit and
inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during combat.

to_change_fate!.name: To Change Fate!
to_change_fate!.description:
$aMoves target ally to opposite side of unit and
grants another action to unit. Grants Atk+6 to
unit and Pair Up cohort (if any) for 1 turn and
inflicts【Isolation】on unit and Pair Up cohort (if
any) through their next action. (Does not stack.)

【Isolation】
Target cannot use or be the target of Assist
skills through its next action. (Target can
neither use nor be the target of skills like
Dance and Sing, skills that neutralize penalties,
like Restore and Harsh Command+, etc.)

laid-back_blade.name: Laid-Back Blade
laid-back_blade.description:
Effective against cavalry foes. At start
of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

veteran_lance.name: Veteran Lance
veteran_lance.description:
If foe initiates combat or, at start of combat,
if foe's HP ≥ 70%, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit
during combat.

crusher.name: Crusher
crusher.description:
Grants Atk+3. Calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res. If a Rally Assist skill
is used by unit, target can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack. No effect
on cavalry allies with Range = 2.)

guard_axe.name: Guard Axe
guard_axe.description:
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per
attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

guard_axe+.name: Guard Axe+
guard_axe+.description:
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per
attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

persecution_bow.name: Persecution Bow
persecution_bow.description:
$aEffective against flying foes. Grants Atk+3.
At start of combat, if【Penalty】is active on
unit or if unit's HP < 100%, grants Atk/Spd+5
during combat, and if unit initiates combat, unit can
make a follow-up attack before foe can
counterattack.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

hades_\u03c9.name: Hades Ω
hades_\u03c9.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4
during combat, and if unit's Special is ready,
grants an additional Atk+6 during combat.

lull_spd_res_1.name: Lull Spd/Res 1
lull_spd_res_1.description:
Inflicts Spd/Res-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd_res_2.name: Lull Spd/Res 2
lull_spd_res_2.description:
Inflicts Spd/Res-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd_res_3.name: Lull Spd/Res 3
lull_spd_res_3.description:
Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Spd/Res (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

atk_def_gap_1.name: Atk/Def Gap 1
atk_def_gap_1.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+1 to ally
with the highest Atk+Def total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

atk_def_gap_2.name: Atk/Def Gap 2
atk_def_gap_2.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+3 to ally
with the highest Atk+Def total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

atk_def_gap_3.name: Atk/Def Gap 3
atk_def_gap_3.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Def+5 to ally
with the highest Atk+Def total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

rouse_spd_def_1.name: Rouse Spd/Def 1
rouse_spd_def_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Def+2 to unit for 1 turn.

rouse_spd_def_2.name: Rouse Spd/Def 2
rouse_spd_def_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Def+4 to unit for 1 turn.

rouse_spd_def_3.name: Rouse Spd/Def 3
rouse_spd_def_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Def+6 to unit for 1 turn.

thunderhead.name: Thunderhead
thunderhead.description:
Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on
unit during combat.

carrot_cudgel.name: Carrot Cudgel
carrot_cudgel.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

carrot_cudgel+.name: Carrot Cudgel+
carrot_cudgel+.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

gilt_fork.name: Gilt Fork
gilt_fork.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

gilt_fork+.name: Gilt Fork+
gilt_fork+.description:
If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Def+5 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Def during combat.

bun-bun_baton.name: Bun-Bun Baton
bun-bun_baton.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against armored foes. Neutralizes
effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks
and effects that prevent unit's follow-up
attacks during combat.

eagles_egg.name: Eagle's Egg
eagles_egg.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and
neutralizes unit's penalties during combat.

zephyr_breath.name: Zephyr Breath
zephyr_breath.description:
Effective against armored foes. Grants Res+3.
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit or if unit is within 2 spaces of
an ally, neutralizes unit's penalties and inflicts
Atk-6 on foe during combat, and foe cannot
make a follow-up attack. If foe's Range = 2,
calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def
or Res.

sturdy_stance_3.name: Sturdy Stance 3
sturdy_stance_3.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+6 during
combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1
on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

chill_atk_res_1.name: Chill Atk/Res 1
chill_atk_res_1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-3 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Atk+Res total
through its next action.

chill_atk_res_2.name: Chill Atk/Res 2
chill_atk_res_2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-5 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Atk+Res total
through its next action.

lance_exp_1.name: Lance Exp. 1
lance_exp_1.description:
While unit lives and uses a lance, unit gets
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

lance_exp_2.name: Lance Exp. 2
lance_exp_2.description:
While unit lives, all lance allies on team get
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

lance_exp_3.name: Lance Exp. 3
lance_exp_3.description:
While unit lives, all lance allies on team get
2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

void_tome.name: Void Tome
void_tome.description:
$aGrants Atk+3. At start of combat, if foe's Atk ≥
50 or if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Def/Res+5 to unit during combat. At start
of combat, if foe's Spd ≥ 35 or if【Penalty】
is active on foe, unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

atk_def_push_4.name: Atk/Def Push 4
atk_def_push_4.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Def+7, but if unit attacked, deals 5 damage
to unit after combat.

impenetrable_dark.name: Impenetrable Dark
impenetrable_dark.description:
During combat, disables skills of all foes
excluding foe in combat.

inveterate_axe.name: Inveterate Axe
inveterate_axe.description:
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, inflicts
Atk/Def-5 on foe on the enemy team with
the lowest Spd through its next action.

candied_dagger.name: Candied Dagger
candied_dagger.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, grants Spd+4 and
boosts damage by 10% of unit's Spd during
combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

rinkahs_club.name: Rinkah's Club
rinkahs_club.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP < 100%
at start of combat, grants Atk/Def+5 and
Special cooldown charge +1 per foe's attack
during combat. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack. Special cooldown charge
granted even if foe's attack deals 0 damage.)

spendthrift_bow.name: Spendthrift Bow
spendthrift_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Atk+7 to
unit and inflicts Atk-7 on foe during combat.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Special
cooldown count+2 on unit. (Cannot exceed
the unit's maximum Special cooldown.)

spendthrift_bow+.name: Spendthrift Bow+
spendthrift_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Atk+7 to
unit and inflicts Atk-7 on foe during combat.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Special
cooldown count+2 on unit. (Cannot exceed
the unit's maximum Special cooldown.)

iagos_tome.name: Iago's Tome
iagos_tome.description:
$aGrants Res+3. At start of odd-numbered turns,
if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3 and that foe is not
adjacent to another foe, inflicts Atk/Spd-4 and
【Guard】on that foe. At start of even-
numbered turns, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Def/Res-4 and【Panic】on that foe.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

astral_breath.name: Astral Breath
astral_breath.description:
Grants Spd+3. Unit can move to a space adjacent
to support partner. If unit is within 3 spaces of
support partner, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to
unit during combat. If foe's Range = 2, calculates
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

close_foil.name: Close Foil
close_foil.description:
If sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast foe
initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during
combat and unit can counterattack regardless
of foe's range.

distant_foil.name: Distant Foil
distant_foil.description:
If sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast foe
initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during
combat and unit can counterattack regardless
of foe's range.

joint_drive_atk.name: Joint Drive Atk
joint_drive_atk.description:
Grants Atk+4 to allies within 2 spaces during
combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally,
grants Atk+4 to unit during combat.

gleipnir.name: Gleipnir
gleipnir.description:
Grants Res+3. At start of combat, if foe's
HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+3 during
combat.

feather_sword.name: Feather Sword
feather_sword.description:
Grants Atk+3. Effective against sword, lance,
axe, colorless bow, and armored foes. If foe
initiates combat and is armored or uses sword,
lance, axe, or colorless bow, or if unit's HP
≤ 75%, unit can counterattack before foe's
first attack.

whitedown_spear.name: Whitedown Spear
whitedown_spear.description:
Grants Atk+3. If the number of flying units
on team ≥ 3 and unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and unit makes
a guaranteed follow-up attack. If the number
of flying allies within 2 spaces ≥ 2 and unit
initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

dragoon_axe.name: Dragoon Axe
dragoon_axe.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if foe's HP = 100%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat and inflicts
Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

winds_of_change.name: Winds of Change
winds_of_change.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit or if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 and neutralizes effects that guarantee
foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent
unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

heros_blood.name: Hero's Blood
heros_blood.description:
Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd. Grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and all allies for 1
turn after combat. (Bonus granted to allies
even if unit's HP reaches 0.)

righteous_wind.name: Righteous Wind
righteous_wind.description:
Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd. Restores
10 HP to unit and all allies after combat.
(Healing does not stack if triggered more than
once per combat. HP restored to allies even if
unit's HP reaches 0.)

dragoon_shield.name: Dragoon Shield
dragoon_shield.description:
Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.
Grants Atk/Spd/Def+3.

belief_in_love.name: Belief in Love
belief_in_love.description:
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe during
combat.

chill_atk_spd_1.name: Chill Atk/Spd 1
chill_atk_spd_1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Atk+Spd total
through its next action.

chill_atk_spd_2.name: Chill Atk/Spd 2
chill_atk_spd_2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Atk+Spd total
through its next action.

spd_def_oath_1.name: Spd/Def Oath 1
spd_def_oath_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Def+3 to unit for 1 turn.

spd_def_oath_2.name: Spd/Def Oath 2
spd_def_oath_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Def+4 to unit for 1 turn.

spd_def_oath_3.name: Spd/Def Oath 3
spd_def_oath_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd/Def+5 to unit for 1 turn.

aymr.name: Aymr
aymr.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit is not adjacent to an ally,
inflicts Atk/Def-6 on foe during combat and foe
cannot make a follow-up attack.

raging_storm.name: Raging Storm
raging_storm.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants another action
to unit if unit is not adjacent to an ally after
combat. (Once per turn. If a skill that moves
unit after combat is used, references unit's
position after that movement occurs.) If foe
uses dragonstone or beast damage and unit
is not adjacent to an ally, unit makes a
guaranteed follow-up attack during combat.

armored_stride_1.name: Armored Stride 1
armored_stride_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100% and unit is
not adjacent to an ally, unit can move 1 extra
space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

armored_stride_2.name: Armored Stride 2
armored_stride_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit is
not adjacent to an ally, unit can move 1 extra
space. (That turn only. Does not stack.)

armored_stride_3.name: Armored Stride 3
armored_stride_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
unit can move 1 extra space. (That turn only.
Does not stack.)

runeaxe.name: Runeaxe
runeaxe.description:
When unit deals damage to foe during combat,
restores 7 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0
damage is dealt.)

bow_of_beauty.name: Bow of Beauty
bow_of_beauty.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes.

chaos_ragnell.name: Chaos Ragnell
chaos_ragnell.description:
Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = current penalty on each of unit's
stats × 2. (Example: if unit has -7 penalty to
Atk, grants Atk+14, for a net bonus of Atk+7.)
Calculates each stat bonus independently.

gurgurant.name: Gurgurant
gurgurant.description:
Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.
Grants Def+3. Inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foes within
2 spaces during combat.

dark_scripture.name: Dark Scripture
dark_scripture.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit is not adjacent to an ally,
inflicts Atk/Res-6 on foe during combat, and if
foe does not have "effective against dragons,"
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

blood_tome.name: Blood Tome
blood_tome.description:
Grants Atk+3. If foe uses bow, dagger, magic,
or staff, reduces damage from area-of-effect
Specials by 80% (excluding Røkkr area-of-
effect Specials) and reduces damage from
foe's attacks by 50%, and if foe is also
colorless, grants weapon-triangle advantage
to unit and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on foe.

brutal_breath.name: Brutal Breath
brutal_breath.description:
Grants Spd+3. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of allies within 2 spaces of unit: 0 allies grants
+5; 1 grants +3; 2 grants +1; ≥3 allies grants
+0.) If the number of allies within 2 spaces is
≤ 1, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe
per attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)  If foe's Range = 2,
calculates damage using the lower of foe's
Def or Res.

mayhem_aether.name: Mayhem Aether
mayhem_aether.description:
During combat, treats foe's Def/Res as
if reduced by 50%. Restores HP = 50%
of damage dealt.

darting_breath.name: Darting Breath
darting_breath.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during
combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per
attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not
stack.)

atk_spd_solo_4.name: Atk/Spd Solo 4
atk_spd_solo_4.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd+7 during combat.

atk_res_solo_4.name: Atk/Res Solo 4
atk_res_solo_4.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Res+7 during combat.

rouse_atk_res_1.name: Rouse Atk/Res 1
rouse_atk_res_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Res+2 to unit for 1 turn.

rouse_atk_res_2.name: Rouse Atk/Res 2
rouse_atk_res_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

rouse_atk_res_3.name: Rouse Atk/Res 3
rouse_atk_res_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Res+6 to unit for 1 turn.

dark_greatsword.name: Dark Greatsword
dark_greatsword.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4
during combat.

pledged_blade.name: Pledged Blade
pledged_blade.description:
$aIf【Bonus】is active on unit, grants
Atk/Def+4 and Special cooldown charge +1
per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. Special
cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack
deals 0 damage.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

pledged_blade+.name: Pledged Blade+
pledged_blade+.description:
$aIf【Bonus】is active on unit, grants
Atk/Def+4 and Special cooldown charge +1
per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. Special
cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack
deals 0 damage.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

huge_fan.name: Huge Fan
huge_fan.description:
$aIf【Bonus】is active on unit, grants
Atk/Def+4 and Special cooldown charge +1
per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. Special
cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack
deals 0 damage.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

huge_fan+.name: Huge Fan+
huge_fan+.description:
$aIf【Bonus】is active on unit, grants
Atk/Def+4 and Special cooldown charge +1
per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. Special
cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack
deals 0 damage.)

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

joyful_vows.name: Joyful Vows
joyful_vows.description:
$aEffective against armored and cavalry foes.
Grants Atk+3. If【Bonus】is active on
unit, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat, and
if unit initiates combat, foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

【Bonus】
All effects that last "for 1 turn" or "that turn
only." Includes bonuses granted by a skill
like Rally or Hone and positive status effects
(extra movement or effects like Dominance).

brides_fang.name: Bride's Fang
brides_fang.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during combat, and if
Special triggers before or during combat and
unit attacked, grants Special cooldown count-1
after combat.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

grooms_wing.name: Groom's Wing
grooms_wing.description:
Grants Res+3. At start of turn 1, grants Special
cooldown count-1 to unit's support partner (if
any).

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

chill_spd_def_1.name: Chill Spd/Def 1
chill_spd_def_1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Spd+Def total
through its next action.

chill_spd_def_2.name: Chill Spd/Def 2
chill_spd_def_2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Spd+Def total
through its next action.

odd_pulse_tie_1.name: Odd Pulse Tie 1
odd_pulse_tie_1.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, if any foe's
HP+5 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is
ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe
with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot
exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

odd_pulse_tie_2.name: Odd Pulse Tie 2
odd_pulse_tie_2.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, if any foe's
HP+3 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is
ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe
with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot
exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

odd_pulse_tie_3.name: Odd Pulse Tie 3
odd_pulse_tie_3.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, if any foe's
HP+1 ≤ unit's HP and that foe's Special is
ready, inflicts Special cooldown count+2 on foe
with the lowest HP among those foes. (Cannot
exceed the foe's maximum Special cooldown.)

nurturing_breath.name: Nurturing Breath
nurturing_breath.description:
Grants Def+3. If foe's Range = 2, calculates
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2 to allies within 7
rows and 7 columns centered on unit
during combat.

bracing_stance_3.name: Bracing Stance 3
bracing_stance_3.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+6 during
combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1
on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

milas_turnwheel.name: Mila's Turnwheel
milas_turnwheel.description:
$aAt start of turn, inflicts【Isolation】on foes in
cardinal directions with Def < unit's Def through
their next actions.

If deployed in Aether Raids offense during Light
season, grants Turn Limit+1. (If the Turn Limit
is 7, it will increase to 8, etc.)

【Isolation】
Target cannot use or be the target of Assist
skills through its next action. (Target can
neither use nor be the target of skills like
Dance and Sing, skills that neutralize penalties,
like Restore and Harsh Command+, etc.)

stalwart_sword.name: Stalwart Sword
stalwart_sword.description:
If foe initiates combat, inflicts Atk-6 on foe
during combat.

hewn_lance.name: Hewn Lance
hewn_lance.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

snipers_bow.name: Sniper's Bow
snipers_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. After combat,
if unit attacked, deals 7 damage to target and
foes within 2 spaces of target, and inflicts
Atk/Spd-7 on them through their next actions.

flower_of_ease.name: Flower of Ease
flower_of_ease.description:
$aGrants Res+3. If【Penalty】is active on any
foes within 3 columns centered on unit, inflicts
Atk/Def/Res-3 on those foes during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

amatsu.name: Amatsu
amatsu.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

apotheosis_spear.name: Apotheosis Spear
apotheosis_spear.description:
Grants Spd+3. Unit can move to a space
adjacent to an ally within 2 spaces. At start
of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 to unit during combat.

barrier_axe.name: Barrier Axe
barrier_axe.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Res+7 during
combat.

barrier_axe+.name: Barrier Axe+
barrier_axe+.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Res+7 during
combat.

levin_dagger.name: Levin Dagger
levin_dagger.description:
$aGrants Res+3. If【Penalty】is active on foe,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and deals
damage = 20% of unit's Res during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

whimsical_dream.name: Whimsical Dream
whimsical_dream.description:
Grants another action to target ally. Grants
Atk+5 to target ally and allies within 2 spaces
of target (excluding unit) for 1 turn. Inflicts
Atk-5 on nearest foes within 4 spaces of target
ally and any foe within 2 spaces of those foes
through their next actions. (Cannot target an
ally with Sing or Dance. This skill treated as
Sing or Dance.)

kestrel_stance_3.name: Kestrel Stance 3
kestrel_stance_3.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+6 during
combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1
on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

joint_drive_spd.name: Joint Drive Spd
joint_drive_spd.description:
Grants Spd+4 to allies within 2 spaces during
combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally,
grants Spd+4 to unit during combat.

great_flame.name: Great Flame
great_flame.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit’s Def ≥ foe’s Def+5, foe
cannot make a follow-up attack. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

elixir_seal.name: Elixir Seal
elixir_seal.description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and an【Elixir】drops.

【Elixir】
Restores 99 HP to all allies

horn_seal.name: Horn Seal
horn_seal.description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and a【Fortifying Horn】drops.

【Fortifying Horn】
Grants all allies Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 for 1 turn.

blade_seal.name: Blade Seal
blade_seal.description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and a【Special Blade】drops.

【Special Blade】
Enables use of Specials for all allies.

boots_seal.name: Boots Seal
boots_seal.description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and【Infantry Boots】drop.

【Infantry Boots】
Grants +1 to movement to all allies for 1 turn.

veil_seal.name: Veil Seal
veil_seal.description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and a【Dancer's Veil】drops.

【Dancer's Veil】
Allows one random ally that has already acted
to take another action.

charm_seal.name: Charm Seal
charm_seal.description:
When the holder of this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeats holder,
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat, and a【Lightning Charm】drops.

【Lightning Charm】
Inflicts 20 damage to all enemies.

guardian_seal.name: Guardian Seal
guardian_seal.description:
Units on the opposing team with Range = 2
cannot move through a space adjacent to the
holder of this seal. (Does not affect units with
Pass.) When foe with this seal is defeated,
restores 10 HP to unit that defeated foe and
inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on that unit
after combat.

coral_bow.name: Coral Bow
coral_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Spd/Def-5
on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

coral_bow+.name: Coral Bow+
coral_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Spd/Def-5
on foes within 2 spaces during combat.

summer_strikers.name: Summer Strikers
summer_strikers.description:
$aAccelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit's HP ≥ 25% at start of combat and unit
initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+5 during
combat and reduces damage from foe's first
attack by 75%.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

flora_guide.name: Flora Guide
flora_guide.description:
Inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

flora_guide+.name: Flora Guide+
flora_guide+.description:
Inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

exotic_fruit_juice.name: Exotic Fruit Juice
exotic_fruit_juice.description:
Grants Atk+3. Inflicts Spd/Res-6 on foes within
2 spaces during combat.

palm_staff.name: Palm Staff
palm_staff.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

palm_staff+.name: Palm Staff+
palm_staff+.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces
during combat.

seal_spd_res_1.name: Seal Spd/Res 1
seal_spd_res_1.description:
Inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe through its next action
after combat.

seal_spd_res_2.name: Seal Spd/Res 2
seal_spd_res_2.description:
Inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe through its next action
after combat.

spd_def_snag_1.name: Spd/Def Snag 1
spd_def_snag_1.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Def-2 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

spd_def_snag_2.name: Spd/Def Snag 2
spd_def_snag_2.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

spd_def_snag_3.name: Spd/Def Snag 3
spd_def_snag_3.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Def-6 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and targeted ally through
their next action.

spd_res_snag_1.name: Spd/Res Snag 1
spd_res_snag_1.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-2 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

spd_res_snag_2.name: Spd/Res Snag 2
spd_res_snag_2.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-4 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

spd_res_snag_3.name: Spd/Res Snag 3
spd_res_snag_3.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-6 on nearest foes within
4 spaces of both unit and target through their
next actions.

fortify_def_4.name: Fortify Def 4
fortify_def_4.description:
At start of turn, grants Def+7 to adjacent allies for
1 turn.

virtuous_tyrfing.name: Virtuous Tyrfing
virtuous_tyrfing.description:
Grants Res+3. If foe initiates combat or if unit's
HP < 100% at start of combat, inflicts Atk/Def-6
on foe during combat, and if unit deals damage
to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit.
(Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

holy_wars_end.name: Holy War's End
holy_wars_end.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat,
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
before foe can counterattack.

dark_royal_spear.name: Dark Royal Spear
dark_royal_spear.description:
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, grants Atk/Def/Res+5 to unit
during combat.

gloom_breath.name: Gloom Breath
gloom_breath.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-7 on foes
within 2 spaces through their next actions.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Atk/Spd-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces
of target through their next actions. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower
of foe's Def or Res.

starpoint_lance.name: Starpoint Lance
starpoint_lance.description:
Grants Spd+3. During unit's first combat
in player phase or enemy phase, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and restores
10 HP to unit after combat.

hidden_thorns.name: Hidden Thorns
hidden_thorns.description:
$aDuring unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

hidden_thorns+.name: Hidden Thorns+
hidden_thorns+.description:
$aDuring unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

suns_percussors.name: Sun's Percussors
suns_percussors.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd or
if foe's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit
during combat and neutralizes effects that
guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects
that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

conch_bouquet.name: Conch Bouquet
conch_bouquet.description:
During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

conch_bouquet+.name: Conch Bouquet+
conch_bouquet+.description:
During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

melon_float.name: Melon Float
melon_float.description:
During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

melon_float+.name: Melon Float+
melon_float+.description:
During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

chill_spd_res_1.name: Chill Spd/Res 1
chill_spd_res_1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total
through its next action.

chill_spd_res_2.name: Chill Spd/Res 2
chill_spd_res_2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total
through its next action.

guard_bearing_1.name: Guard Bearing 1
guard_bearing_1.description:
During unit's first combat in enemy phase,
if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 30%.

guard_bearing_2.name: Guard Bearing 2
guard_bearing_2.description:
During unit's first combat in enemy phase,
if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 40%.

guard_bearing_3.name: Guard Bearing 3
guard_bearing_3.description:
During unit's first combat in enemy phase,
if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.

atk_cantrip_1.name: Atk Cantrip 1
atk_cantrip_1.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-3 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

atk_cantrip_2.name: Atk Cantrip 2
atk_cantrip_2.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-5 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

atk_cantrip_3.name: Atk Cantrip 3
atk_cantrip_3.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-7 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

beloved_zofia.name: Beloved Zofia
beloved_zofia.description:
Grants Def+3. At start of combat, if unit's
HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4, but
after combat, if unit attacked, deals 4
damage to unit.

blade_of_shadow.name: Blade of Shadow
blade_of_shadow.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, neutralizes penalties on unit
and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during
combat.

spear_of_shadow.name: Spear of Shadow
spear_of_shadow.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, neutralizes penalties on unit
and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def-5 on foe during
combat.

caltrop_dagger.name: Caltrop Dagger
caltrop_dagger.description:
$aEffective against cavalry foes. Disables unit's
and foe's skills that change attack priority.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

caltrop_dagger+.name: Caltrop Dagger+
caltrop_dagger+.description:
$aEffective against cavalry foes. Disables unit's
and foe's skills that change attack priority.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

nightmare_horn.name: Nightmare Horn
nightmare_horn.description:
Grants Spd+3. Unit can counterattack
regardless of foe's range. If unit's Spd > foe's
Spd, reduces damage from attacks during
combat and from area-of-effect Specials
(excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by
percentage = difference between stats × 4
(max 40%).

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

spurn_1.name: Spurn 1
spurn_1.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 2 (max 20%). If unit's HP ≤ 25% and
unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage
when Special triggers.

spurn_2.name: Spurn 2
spurn_2.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 3 (max 30%). If unit's HP ≤ 50% and
unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage
when Special triggers.

spurn_3.name: Spurn 3
spurn_3.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from
attacks during combat and from area-of-effect
Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect
Specials) by percentage = difference between
stats × 4 (max 40%). If unit's HP ≤ 75% and
unit's attack triggers Special, deals +5 damage
when Special triggers.

guard_bow.name: Guard Bow
guard_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. If foe initiates
combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or
staff, grants Def/Res+6 to unit during
combat.

guard_bow+.name: Guard Bow+
guard_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. If foe initiates
combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or
staff, grants Def/Res+6 to unit during
combat.

absorb+.name: Absorb+
absorb+.description:
Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt.
After combat, if unit attacked, restores
7 HP to allies within 2 spaces of unit.

fear+.name: Fear+
fear+.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk-7
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
through their next actions.

slow+.name: Slow+
slow+.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Spd-7
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
through their next actions.

gravity+.name: Gravity+
gravity+.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status
on target and foes within 1 space of target
restricting movement to 1 space through
their next actions.

pain+.name: Pain+
pain+.description:
Deals 10 damage to target and foes
within 2 spaces of target after combat.

panic+.name: Panic+
panic+.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, converts
bonuses on target and foes within 2 spaces
of target into penalties through their next
actions.

candlelight+.name: Candlelight+
candlelight+.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
preventing counterattacks through their
next actions.

physic+.name: Physic+
physic+.description:
Restores HP = 50% of Atk. (Minimum of
8 HP.) Range = 2.

recover+.name: Recover+
recover+.description:
Restores HP = 50% of Atk +10.
(Minimum of 15 HP.)

martyr+.name: Martyr+
martyr+.description:
Restores HP = damage dealt to unit +50%
of Atk. (Minimum of 7 HP.) Restores HP to
unit = half damage dealt to unit.

rehabilitate+.name: Rehabilitate+
rehabilitate+.description:
Restores HP = 50% of Atk -10.
(Minimum of 7 HP.) If target's HP
is ≤ 50%, the lower the target's HP,
the more HP is restored.

laevatein.name: Laevatein
laevatein.description:
Grants Atk+3. Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total
bonuses on unit during combat.

leiptr.name: Leiptr
leiptr.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

sinmara.name: Sinmara
sinmara.description:
Grants Def+3. At start of turn, deals
20 damage to foes within 2 spaces.

th\u00f6kk.name: Thökk
th\u00f6kk.description:
Calculates damage from staff like other
weapons. At start of turn, if foe's HP ≤ unit's
HP-3 and foe is in cardinal direction and
uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, foe
cannot move more than 1 space through its
action.

ice_mirror.name: Ice Mirror
ice_mirror.description:
If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage
from foe's attacks by 30%. Boosts unit's next
attack by total damage reduced (by any
source, including other skills) when Special
triggers. Resets at end of combat. (Skill
cannot be inherited.)

vengeful_fighter_2.name: Vengeful Fighter 2

distant_guard_1.description:

during combat."

distant_guard_2.name: Distant Guard 2
distant_guard_2.description:

dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+3
during combat."

distant_guard_3.name: Distant Guard 3
distant_guard_3.description:

dagger, magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+4
during combat."

sky_maiougi.description:

After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/
Res-5 on target and foes within 2 spaces of
target through their next actions.

Effective against armored foes. Disables unit's

target through their next actions.

After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/
Res-5 on target and foes within 2 spaces of
target through their next actions.

cloud_maiougi+.description:

fireflood_dance_1.name: Fireflood Dance 1
fireflood_dance_1.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 and
Res+3 to target.

fireflood_dance_2.name: Fireflood Dance 2
fireflood_dance_2.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 and
Res+4 to target.

rockslide_dance_1.name: Rockslide Dance 1
rockslide_dance_1.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+2 and

rockslide_dance_2.name: Rockslide Dance 2
rockslide_dance_2.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+3 and
Def+4 to target.

spur_spd_res_1.description:

spur_spd_res_2.name: Spur Spd/Res 2
spur_spd_res_2.description:
Grants Spd/Res+3 to adjacent allies during
combat.

odd_def_wave_1.name: Odd Def Wave 1
odd_def_wave_1.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, grants Def+2
to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus

odd_def_wave_2.name: Odd Def Wave 2
odd_def_wave_2.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, grants Def+4
to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus
granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

odd_def_wave_3.name: Odd Def Wave 3
odd_def_wave_3.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, grants Def+6
to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus
granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

royal_sword.name: Royal Sword
royal_sword.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants unit Special cooldown charge +1

Does not stack.)

maltet.name: Maltet
maltet.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit's HP ≥ 50% and foe initiates combat, unit
makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

garm.name: Garm
garm.description:
Grants Atk+3. If a bonus granted by a skill like
Rally or Hone and/or extra movement granted
by a skill like Armor March or Armored Boots is
active, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack.

hli\u00f0skj\u00e1lf.name: Hliðskjálf
hli\u00f0skj\u00e1lf.description:
Foe cannot counterattack. After combat, if unit
attacked, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on target
and foes within 2 spaces of target through their
next actions, and grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to
unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.

windfire_balm.name: Windfire Balm
windfire_balm.description:
When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Atk/Spd+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

windfire_balm+.name: Windfire Balm+
windfire_balm+.description:
When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Atk/Spd+6 to all allies for 1 turn.

ostian_counter.name: Ostian Counter
ostian_counter.description:
Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's
range. If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat.

death_blow_4.name: Death Blow 4
death_blow_4.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+8 during
combat.

double_lion.name: Double Lion
double_lion.description:
If unit's HP = 100% at start of combat and
unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice, but
deals 1 damage to unit after combat. (Does
not stack.)

special_fighter_1.name: Special Fighter 1
special_fighter_1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 90%, grants
Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts
Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

special_fighter_2.name: Special Fighter 2
special_fighter_2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 70%, grants
Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts
Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

special_fighter_3.name: Special Fighter 3
special_fighter_3.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants
Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts
Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

even_res_wave_1.name: Even Res Wave 1
even_res_wave_1.description:
At start of even-numbered turns, grants Res+2
to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus
granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

even_res_wave_2.name: Even Res Wave 2
even_res_wave_2.description:
At start of even-numbered turns, grants Res+4
to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus
granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

even_res_wave_3.name: Even Res Wave 3
even_res_wave_3.description:
At start of even-numbered turns, grants Res+6
to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus
granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

close_guard_1.name: Close Guard 1
close_guard_1.description:
Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses sword,
lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage,
grants Def/Res+2 during combat."

close_guard_2.name: Close Guard 2
close_guard_2.description:
Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses sword,
lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage,
grants Def/Res+3 during combat."

close_guard_3.name: Close Guard 3
close_guard_3.description:
Allies within 2 spaces gain: "If foe uses sword,
lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage,
grants Def/Res+4 during combat."

exalted_falchion.name: Exalted Falchion
exalted_falchion.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Grants Spd+3.
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats.
Calculates each stat bonus independently.

fire_emblem.name: Fire Emblem
fire_emblem.description:
Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd.
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and all allies
for 1 turn after combat. (Bonus granted to
allies even if unit's HP reaches 0.)

binding_shield.name: Binding Shield
binding_shield.description:
In combat against a dragon foe, unit makes a
guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot
counterattack or make a follow-up attack.

infantry_flash_1.name: Infantry Flash 1
infantry_flash_1.description:
Infantry allies within 2 spaces gain: "If unit's
Spd ≥ foe's Spd+5, grants Special cooldown
charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)"

infantry_flash_2.name: Infantry Flash 2
infantry_flash_2.description:
Infantry allies within 2 spaces gain: "If unit's
Spd ≥ foe's Spd+3, grants Special cooldown
charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)"

infantry_flash_3.name: Infantry Flash 3
infantry_flash_3.description:
Infantry allies within 2 spaces gain: "If unit's
Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special cooldown
charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)"

cherches_axe.name: Cherche's Axe
cherches_axe.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

odins_grimoire.name: Odin's Grimoire
odins_grimoire.description:
Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on
unit during combat.

barrier_blade.name: Barrier Blade
barrier_blade.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Res+7 during
combat.

barrier_blade+.name: Barrier Blade+
barrier_blade+.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Res+7 during
combat.

g\u00e1e_bolg.name: Gáe Bolg
g\u00e1e_bolg.description:
In combat against an infantry, armored, or
cavalry foe, grants Atk/Def+5 during combat.

forseti.name: Forseti
forseti.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit
initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack.

rally_spd_def+.name: Rally Spd/Def+
rally_spd_def+.description: Grants Spd/Def+6 to target ally for 1 turn.

steady_posture_1.name: Steady Posture 1
steady_posture_1.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+2 during

steady_posture_2.name: Steady Posture 2
steady_posture_2.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+4 during
combat.

special_spiral_2.name: Special Spiral 2
special_spiral_2.description:
If Special triggers before or during combat,
grants Special cooldown count-1 after combat.

special_spiral_3.name: Special Spiral 3
special_spiral_3.description:

grants Special cooldown count-2 after combat.

deluge_dance_1.name: Deluge Dance 1
deluge_dance_1.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants Spd+2 and
Res+3 to target.

deluge_dance_2.name: Deluge Dance 2
deluge_dance_2.description:

Res+4 to target.

shining_bow.name: Shining Bow

shining_bow+.name: Shining Bow+
shining_bow+.description:

hoarfrost_knife.name: Hoarfrost Knife

counter, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of

attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack. Special cooldown

breath_of_blight.description:

At the start of turn 4, deals 10 damage to foes

number of foes within 3 spaces × 5. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower
of foe's Def or Res.

rally_up_atk.name: Rally Up Atk
