2 spaces of target (excluding unit) for 1 turn.

rally_up_atk+.name: Rally Up Atk+
rally_up_atk+.description:
Grants Atk+6 to target ally and allies within
2 spaces of target (excluding unit) for 1 turn.

atk_res_solo_1.name: Atk/Res Solo 1
atk_res_solo_1.description:

atk_res_solo_2.name: Atk/Res Solo 2
atk_res_solo_2.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Res+4 during combat.

atk_res_solo_3.name: Atk/Res Solo 3
atk_res_solo_3.description:

Atk/Res+6 during combat.

or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd_res_link_2.description:

Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Spd/Res+4 to unit and target ally
or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd_res_link_3.description:

Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Spd/Res+6 to unit and target ally

even_def_wave_1.name: Even Def Wave 1
even_def_wave_1.description:

granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

even_def_wave_2.description:

unit's stats as 160 in modes like Arena.

(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

g_duel_infantry_2.description:
Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and

stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

g_duel_infantry_3.description:
Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

odd_spd_wave_1.name: Odd Spd Wave 1
odd_spd_wave_1.description:

divine_mist.name: Divine Mist
divine_mist.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Unit can

If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage

fierce_breath.name: Fierce Breath
fierce_breath.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during
combat and Special cooldown charge +1 per
attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not
stack.)

with_everyone!.name: With Everyone!
with_everyone!.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Def/Res+5 to unit and adjacent allies for
1 turn.

hack-o-lantern.name: Hack-o'-Lantern
hack-o-lantern.description:
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per
attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

hack-o-lantern+.name: Hack-o'-Lantern+
hack-o-lantern+.description:
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per
attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

devilish_bow.name: Devilish Bow
devilish_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Special

stack.)

devilish_bow+.name: Devilish Bow+
devilish_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Special

combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not
stack.)

bottled_juice.description:
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per
attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.) After combat, if unit

actions.

bottled_juice+.name: Bottled Juice+
bottled_juice+.description:
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per

witchy_wand.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, resets Special

combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not

cooldown charge -1 per attack during combat.

after combat, but skills that Accelerate and

damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Atk/Spd+4 to unit and target ally
or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

atk_spd_link_3.name: Atk/Spd Link 3
atk_spd_link_3.description:

Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit and target ally
or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

even_atk_wave_1.name: Even Atk Wave 1
even_atk_wave_1.description:
At start of even-numbered turns, grants Atk+2
to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus
granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

even_atk_wave_2.name: Even Atk Wave 2
even_atk_wave_2.description:
At start of even-numbered turns, grants Atk+4
to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus
granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

even_atk_wave_3.name: Even Atk Wave 3
even_atk_wave_3.description:
At start of even-numbered turns, grants Atk+6
to unit and adjacent allies for 1 turn. (Bonus
granted to unit even if no allies are adjacent.)

aversas_night.name: Aversa's Night

Boosts damage by 10. If unit is adjacent to an
ally, boosts damage by 25 instead.

earthwater_balm.name: Earthwater Balm

When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Def/Res+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

earthwater_balm+.description:
When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Def/Res+6 to all allies for 1 turn.

c_duel_infantry_1.name: C Duel Infantry 1
c_duel_infantry_1.description:
Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's
stats as 160 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

c_duel_infantry_2.name: C Duel Infantry 2
c_duel_infantry_2.description:
Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's
stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

c_duel_infantry_3.name: C Duel Infantry 3
c_duel_infantry_3.description:
Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

storm_sieglinde.name: Storm Sieglinde
storm_sieglinde.description:
Grants Atk+3. If the number of foes within
2 spaces (excluding target) ≥ the number of
allies within 2 spaces (excluding unit),
grants Def/Res+3 and Special cooldown
charge +1 per unit's attack during combat.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk_spd_solo_1.name: Atk/Spd Solo 1
atk_spd_solo_1.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd+2 during combat.

atk_spd_solo_2.name: Atk/Spd Solo 2
atk_spd_solo_2.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

atk_spd_solo_3.name: Atk/Spd Solo 3

Deals damage = 50% of foe's Def when
Special triggers.

book_of_dreams.name: Book of Dreams
book_of_dreams.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit is adjacent to an ally,
inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe during
combat.

book_of_shadows.name: Book of Shadows
book_of_shadows.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit is adjacent to an ally,
inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe during
combat.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status
on foe preventing counterattacks through its
next action.

flash+.name: Flash+
flash+.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
preventing counterattacks through their
next actions.

draconic_rage.name: Draconic Rage
draconic_rage.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If the number of allies within 2 spaces
(excluding unit) > the number of foes within 2
spaces (excluding target), grants Atk/Spd+5
during combat. If foe's Range = 2, calculates
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

rally_atk_spd+.name: Rally Atk/Spd+
rally_atk_spd+.description: Grants Atk/Spd+6 to target ally for 1 turn.

torrent_dance_2.name: Torrent Dance 2
torrent_dance_2.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Res+4 to target.

torrent_dance_3.name: Torrent Dance 3
torrent_dance_3.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Res+5 to target.

atk_res_link_1.name: Atk/Res Link 1
atk_res_link_1.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Atk/Res+2 to unit and target ally
or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

atk_res_link_2.name: Atk/Res Link 2
atk_res_link_2.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit and target ally
or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

atk_res_link_3.name: Atk/Res Link 3
atk_res_link_3.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Atk/Res+6 to unit and target ally
or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

null_follow-up_1.name: Null Follow-Up 1
null_follow-up_1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%,
neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's
follow-up attacks and effects that prevent
unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

null_follow-up_2.name: Null Follow-Up 2
null_follow-up_2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%,
neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's
follow-up attacks and effects that prevent
unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

null_follow-up_3.name: Null Follow-Up 3
null_follow-up_3.description:
Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's
follow-up attacks and effects that prevent
unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

sylgr.name: Sylgr
sylgr.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's
Spd > foe's Spd, grants Atk/Spd+4 during
combat. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces
of target through their next actions.

imhullu.name: Imhullu
imhullu.description:
Grants Res+3. At the start of turn 3, deals 5
damage to non-magic foes within 5 columns
centered on unit, and inflicts status on those
foes preventing counterattacks through their
next actions.

steady_stance_4.name: Steady Stance 4
steady_stance_4.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Def+8 during
combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1
on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

sorcery_blade_1.name: Sorcery Blade 1
sorcery_blade_1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and
unit is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

sorcery_blade_2.name: Sorcery Blade 2
sorcery_blade_2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit
is adjacent to a magic ally, calculates damage
using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

sorcery_blade_3.name: Sorcery Blade 3
sorcery_blade_3.description:
At start of combat, if unit is adjacent to a magic
ally, calculates damage using the lower of foe's
Def or Res.

surtrs_menace.name: Surtr's Menace
surtrs_menace.description:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a
foe, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 for 1 turn and
inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foes within 2
spaces through their next actions.

gj\u00f6ll.name: Gjöll
gj\u00f6ll.description:
Grants Atk+3. If a penalty inflicted by a skill like
Panic or Threaten and/or a negative status
effect (preventing counterattacks or restricting
movement) is active on foe, unit makes a
guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot.

freezing_seal.name: Freezing Seal
freezing_seal.description:
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, inflicts
Atk/Spd-6 on foe on the enemy team with
the lowest Res through its next action.

gladiators_blade.name: Gladiator's Blade
gladiators_blade.description:
If unit’s Atk > foe’s Atk, grants Special
cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only
highest value applied. Does not stack.)

whitewing_blade.name: Whitewing Blade
whitewing_blade.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk
by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage,
reduces Atk by 20%.

tactical_bolt.name: Tactical Bolt
tactical_bolt.description:
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against
colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.

tactical_gale.name: Tactical Gale
tactical_gale.description:
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against
colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.

s\u00f6kkvabekkr.name: Sökkvabekkr
s\u00f6kkvabekkr.description:
If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat, and
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, but
after combat, if unit attacked, deals 20 damage
to nearest ally.

lyfjaberg.name: Lyfjaberg
lyfjaberg.description:
Grants Res+3. At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥
50%, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat, and if
unit initiates combat, foe cannot make a
follow-up attack. After combat, if unit attacked,
inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2
spaces of target through their next actions, and
if bonus was granted to unit, deals 4 damage to
unit.

\u00edfingr.name: Ífingr
\u00edfingr.description:
Effective against dragon foes. If unit is within 3
spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4
and neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's
follow-up attacks during combat, but after
combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/
Res-4 on nearest ally through its next action.

mystic_boost_1.name: Mystic Boost 1
mystic_boost_1.description:
Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage
using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and
"calculate damage from staff like other
weapons." Restores 2 HP after combat.

mystic_boost_2.name: Mystic Boost 2
mystic_boost_2.description:
Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage
using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and
"calculate damage from staff like other
weapons." Restores 4 HP after combat.

mystic_boost_3.name: Mystic Boost 3
mystic_boost_3.description:
Disables foe's skills that "calculate damage
using the lower of foe's Def or Res" and
"calculate damage from staff like other
weapons." Restores 6 HP after combat.

sparkling_boost.name: Sparkling Boost
sparkling_boost.description:
At start of turn, restores 10 HP to ally that has
been dealt the most damage. (Excludes unit.)

festive_siegmund.name: Festive Siegmund
festive_siegmund.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

goodie_boot.name: Goodie Boot
goodie_boot.description:
During combat, boosts unit's Def/Res by
number of allies within 2 spaces × 2. (Maximum
bonus of +6 to each stat.) After combat, if unit
attacked, inflicts Def/Res-5 on target and foes
within 2 spaces of target through their next
actions.

goodie_boot+.name: Goodie Boot+
goodie_boot+.description:
During combat, boosts unit's Def/Res by
number of allies within 2 spaces × 2. (Maximum
bonus of +6 to each stat.) After combat, if unit
attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes
within 2 spaces of target through their next
actions.

joyous_lantern.name: Joyous Lantern
joyous_lantern.description:
At start of turn, grants Def/Res+3 to ally with
the highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

joyous_lantern+.name: Joyous Lantern+
joyous_lantern+.description:
At start of turn, grants Def/Res+5 to ally with
the highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

glittering_breath.name: Glittering Breath
glittering_breath.description:
During combat, boosts unit's Def/Res by
number of allies within 2 spaces × 2. (Maximum
bonus of +6 to each stat.) If foe's Range = 2,
calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def
or Res.

glittering_breath+.name: Glittering Breath+
glittering_breath+.description:
During combat, boosts unit's Def/Res by
number of allies within 2 spaces × 2. (Maximum
bonus of +6 to each stat.) If foe's Range = 2,
calculates damage using the lower of foe's Def
or Res.

def_res_bond_1.name: Def/Res Bond 1
def_res_bond_1.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+3
during combat.

def_res_bond_2.name: Def/Res Bond 2
def_res_bond_2.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+4
during combat.

def_res_bond_3.name: Def/Res Bond 3
def_res_bond_3.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Def/Res+5
during combat.

atk_def_solo_1.name: Atk/Def Solo 1
atk_def_solo_1.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Def+2 during combat.

atk_def_solo_2.name: Atk/Def Solo 2
atk_def_solo_2.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Def+4 during combat.

atk_def_solo_3.name: Atk/Def Solo 3
atk_def_solo_3.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Def+6 during combat.

atk_opening_1.name: Atk Opening 1
atk_opening_1.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk+2 to ally with the
highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

atk_opening_2.name: Atk Opening 2
atk_opening_2.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk+4 to ally with the
highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

atk_opening_3.name: Atk Opening 3
atk_opening_3.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk+6 to ally with the
highest Atk for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

prayer_wheel.name: Prayer Wheel
prayer_wheel.description:
Grants Spd+3. If a skill like Sing or Dance is
used, grants bonus to target's Atk/Spd/Def/Res
= highest bonus on target ally for 1 turn.
(Example: if target has a +6 bonus to Atk,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6.)

gray_waves.name: Gray Waves
gray_waves.description:
Grants another action to target ally, and if
target is an infantry or flying ally, target can
move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does not
stack. Cannot target an ally with Sing or Dance.
This skill treated as Sing or Dance.)

b_duel_flying_1.name: B Duel Flying 1
b_duel_flying_1.description:
Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's
stats as 160 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

b_duel_flying_2.name: B Duel Flying 2
b_duel_flying_2.description:
Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's
stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

b_duel_flying_3.name: B Duel Flying 3
b_duel_flying_3.description:
Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

hikami.name: Hikami
hikami.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of turn, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on nearest foes within 4
spaces through their next actions.

geishun.name: Geishun
geishun.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk-7 on foe
on the enemy team with the highest
Atk through its next action.

geishun+.name: Geishun+
geishun+.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk-7 on foe
on the enemy team with the highest
Atk through its next action.

wagasa.name: Wagasa
wagasa.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Def-7 on foe
on the enemy team with the highest
Def through its next action.

wagasa+.name: Wagasa+
wagasa+.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Def-7 on foe
on the enemy team with the highest
Def through its next action.

kabura_ya.name: Kabura Ya
kabura_ya.description:
Effective against flying foes. At start of turn,
inflicts Spd-7 on foe on the enemy team with
the highest Spd through its next action.

kabura_ya+.name: Kabura Ya+
kabura_ya+.description:
Effective against flying foes. At start of turn,
inflicts Spd-7 on foe on the enemy team with
the highest Spd through its next action.

kumade.name: Kumade
kumade.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe
on the enemy team with the highest
Def through its next action.

kumade+.name: Kumade+
kumade+.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foe
on the enemy team with the highest
Def through its next action.

earthfire_balm.name: Earthfire Balm
earthfire_balm.description:
When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Atk/Def+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

earthfire_balm+.name: Earthfire Balm+
earthfire_balm+.description:
When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Atk/Def+6 to all allies for 1 turn.

hone_atk_4.name: Hone Atk 4
hone_atk_4.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk+7 to adjacent allies
for 1 turn.

joint_hone_spd.name: Joint Hone Spd
joint_hone_spd.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Spd+5 to unit and adjacent allies for
1 turn.

tome_of_thoron.name: Tome of Thoron
tome_of_thoron.description:
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 75% and unit's
attack triggers Special, grants Special
cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage
when Special triggers.

hel_scythe.name: Hel Scythe
hel_scythe.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If foe does not use magic or staff, calculates
damage using foe's Res, and if unit’s HP > 1
and foe would reduce unit’s HP to 0, unit
survives with 1 HP. (Once per combat. Does not
stack.)

whelp_(infantry).name: Whelp (Infantry)
whelp_(infantry).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

yearling_(infantry).name: Yearling (Infantry)
yearling_(infantry).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

adult_(infantry).name: Adult (Infantry)
adult_(infantry).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

wolf_queen_fang.name: Wolf Queen Fang
wolf_queen_fang.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Spd by
number of allies within 2 spaces × 2. (Maximum
bonus of +6 to each stat.) At start of turn, if
unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or
if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms
(otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms,
grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when
Special triggers.

hatchling_(flier).name: Hatchling (Flier)
hatchling_(flier).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.) If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2.

fledgling_(flier).name: Fledgling (Flier)
fledgling_(flier).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.) If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2.

adult_(flier).name: Adult (Flier)
adult_(flier).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, unit can move 1 extra space.
(That turn only. Does not stack.) If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2.

hawk_king_claw.name: Hawk King Claw
hawk_king_claw.description:
Grants Atk+3. If foe's HP = 100% and if unit
initiates combat, unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack. At start of turn, if unit is
adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit
is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms
(otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, unit
can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does
not stack.) If unit transforms, grants Atk+2.

raven_king_beak.name: Raven King Beak
raven_king_beak.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, deals
damage = 70% of difference between stats.
(Maximum bonus of +7 damage. Combos with
Phantom Spd.) At start of turn, if unit is
adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit
is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms
(otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms, unit
can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does
not stack.) If unit transforms, grants Atk+2.

heron_wing.name: Heron Wing
heron_wing.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of turn, restores 7 HP
to allies within 2 spaces of unit. At start of turn,
if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies
or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, unit can move 1 extra space. (That
turn only. Does not stack.) If unit transforms,
grants Atk+2.

sturdy_impact.name: Sturdy Impact
sturdy_impact.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Def+10
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

null_c-disrupt_1.name: Null C-Disrupt 1
null_c-disrupt_1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%,
neutralizes effects that prevent unit's
counterattacks during combat.

null_c-disrupt_2.name: Null C-Disrupt 2
null_c-disrupt_2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%,
neutralizes effects that prevent unit's
counterattacks during combat.

null_c-disrupt_3.name: Null C-Disrupt 3
null_c-disrupt_3.description:
Neutralizes effects that prevent unit's
counterattacks during combat.

hone_beasts.name: Hone Beasts
hone_beasts.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Spd+6 to adjacent
beast allies for 1 turn.

fortify_beasts.name: Fortify Beasts
fortify_beasts.description:
At start of turn, grants Def/Res+6 to adjacent
beast allies for 1 turn.

glare.name: Glare
glare.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status
on target and foes within 1 space of target
restricting movement to 1 space through
their next actions.

its_curtains.name: It's Curtains...
its_curtains.description:
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-2.

its_curtains+.name: It's Curtains...+
its_curtains+.description:
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-2.

red-hot_ducks.name: Red-Hot Ducks
red-hot_ducks.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, deals damage = 70%
of difference between stats. (Maximum bonus
of +7 damage. Combos with Phantom Spd.)
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target
through their next actions.

red-hot_ducks+.name: Red-Hot Ducks+
red-hot_ducks+.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, deals damage = 70%
of difference between stats. (Maximum bonus
of +7 damage. Combos with Phantom Spd.)
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target
through their next actions.

splashy_bucket.name: Splashy Bucket
splashy_bucket.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Disables foe's
skills that "calculate damage using the lower of
foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from
staff like other weapons." After combat, if unit
attacked, inflicts Def/Res-5 on foes within 2
spaces of target through their next actions.

splashy_bucket+.name: Splashy Bucket+
splashy_bucket+.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Disables foe's
skills that "calculate damage using the lower of
foe's Def or Res" and "calculate damage from
staff like other weapons." After combat, if unit
attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on foes within 2
spaces of target through their next actions.

ouch_pouch.name: Ouch Pouch
ouch_pouch.description:
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-2. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target
through their next actions.

ouch_pouch+.name: Ouch Pouch+
ouch_pouch+.description:
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-2. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target
through their next actions.

grandscratcher.name: Grandscratcher
grandscratcher.description:
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-1 to ally with the highest Atk. (If that ally
does not have a Special skill, this skill has no
effect.)

grandscratcher+.name: Grandscratcher+
grandscratcher+.description:
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-1 to ally with the highest Atk. (If that ally
does not have a Special skill, this skill has no
effect.)

fireflood_balm.name: Fireflood Balm
fireflood_balm.description:
When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Atk/Res+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

fireflood_balm+.name: Fireflood Balm+
fireflood_balm+.description:
When healing an ally with a staff, grants
Atk/Res+6 to all allies for 1 turn.

atk_feint_1.name: Atk Feint 1
atk_feint_1.description:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk-3 on foes in cardinal directions
of unit through their next actions.

atk_feint_2.name: Atk Feint 2
atk_feint_2.description:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk-5 on foes in cardinal directions
of unit through their next actions.

atk_feint_3.name: Atk Feint 3
atk_feint_3.description:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk-7 on foes in cardinal directions
of unit through their next actions.

spd_opening_1.name: Spd Opening 1
spd_opening_1.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd+2 to ally with the
highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

spd_opening_2.name: Spd Opening 2
spd_opening_2.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd+4 to ally with the
highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

spd_opening_3.name: Spd Opening 3
spd_opening_3.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd+6 to ally with the
highest Spd for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

air_orders_1.name: Air Orders 1
air_orders_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100%, grants the
following status to adjacent flying allies for 1
turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any
ally within 2 spaces."

air_orders_2.name: Air Orders 2
air_orders_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants the
following status to adjacent flying allies for 1
turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent to any
ally within 2 spaces."

air_orders_3.name: Air Orders 3
air_orders_3.description:
At start of turn, grants the following status to
adjacent flying allies for 1 turn: "Unit can move
to a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

fell_breath.name: Fell Breath
fell_breath.description:
Grants Atk+3. At the start of combat, if foe’s
HP < 100%, grants Atk/Res+6 during combat
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack. If
foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

def_res_solo_1.name: Def/Res Solo 1
def_res_solo_1.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Def/Res+2 during combat.

def_res_solo_2.name: Def/Res Solo 2
def_res_solo_2.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Def/Res+4 during combat.

def_res_solo_3.name: Def/Res Solo 3
def_res_solo_3.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Def/Res+6 during combat.

upheaval.name: Upheaval
upheaval.description:
At the start of turn 1, deals 7 damage to all
foes, and if defending in Aether Raids during
anima season, destroys offensive structure
within same column as unit. (Does not affect
structures that cannot be destroyed.)

silverbrand.name: Silverbrand
silverbrand.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk
by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage,
reduces Atk by 20%.

hinatas_katana.name: Hinata's Katana
hinatas_katana.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4
during combat.

tharjas_hex.name: Tharja's Hex
tharjas_hex.description:
Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on
unit during combat.

iriss_tome.name: Iris's Tome
iriss_tome.description:
Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on
unit during combat.

niless_bow.name: Niles's Bow
niless_bow.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against flying foes. If foe's Def ≥ foe's
Res+5, deals +7 damage.

hearts_blade.name: Heart's Blade
hearts_blade.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

hearts_blade+.name: Heart's Blade+
hearts_blade+.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

faithful_axe.name: Faithful Axe
faithful_axe.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

faithful_axe+.name: Faithful Axe+
faithful_axe+.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

loyal_wreath.name: Loyal Wreath
loyal_wreath.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

loyal_wreath+.name: Loyal Wreath+
loyal_wreath+.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

bl\u00e1rblooms.name: Blárblooms
bl\u00e1rblooms.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

bl\u00e1rblooms+.name: Blárblooms+
bl\u00e1rblooms+.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

gronnblooms.name: Gronnblooms
gronnblooms.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

gronnblooms+.name: Gronnblooms+
gronnblooms+.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

rally_def_res+.name: Rally Def/Res+
rally_def_res+.description: Grants Def/Res+6 to target ally for 1 turn.

fury_4.name: Fury 4
fury_4.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4. After combat, deals 8
damage to unit.

res_feint_1.name: Res Feint 1
res_feint_1.description:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Res-3 on foes in cardinal directions
of unit through their next actions.

res_feint_2.name: Res Feint 2
res_feint_2.description:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Res-5 on foes in cardinal directions
of unit through their next actions.

res_feint_3.name: Res Feint 3
res_feint_3.description:
If a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Res-7 on foes in cardinal directions
of unit through their next actions.

res_opening_1.name: Res Opening 1
res_opening_1.description:
At start of turn, grants Res+2 to ally with the
highest Res for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

res_opening_2.name: Res Opening 2
res_opening_2.description:
At start of turn, grants Res+4 to ally with the
highest Res for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

res_opening_3.name: Res Opening 3
res_opening_3.description:
At start of turn, grants Res+6 to ally with the
highest Res for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

wolfskin_fang.name: Wolfskin Fang
wolfskin_fang.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice. (Even if foe
initiates combat, unit attacks twice.) At start of
turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon
allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

wolfpup_fang.name: Wolfpup Fang
wolfpup_fang.description:
Grants Spd+3. At the start of turn 1, grants
special cooldown count-2 to unit and unit's
support partner (if any). At start of turn, if unit
is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if
unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms
(otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms,
grants Atk+2 and deals +10 damage when
Special triggers.

whelp_(cavalry).name: Whelp (Cavalry)
whelp_(cavalry).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

yearling_(cavalry).name: Yearling (Cavalry)
yearling_(cavalry).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

adult_(cavalry).name: Adult (Cavalry)
adult_(cavalry).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

kitsune_fang.name: Kitsune Fang
kitsune_fang.description:
Grants Def+3. Grants allies within 2 spaces
bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat =
current bonus on each of unit's stats.
Calculates each stat bonus independently. At
start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or
dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

foxkit_fang.name: Foxkit Fang
foxkit_fang.description:
Grants Res+3. At start of combat, if unit's Res
> foe's Res, and if foe uses sword, lance, axe,
dragonstone, or beast damage, grants bonus to
Atk/Spd/Def/Res = 50% of difference between
stats. (Maximum bonus of +8 to each stat.)
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

taguel_fang.name: Taguel Fang
taguel_fang.description:
Effective against cavalry foes. If unit is adjacent
to only beast or dragon allies or if unit is not
adjacent to any ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3
during combat. At start of turn, if unit is
adjacent to only beast or dragon allies or if unit
is not adjacent to any ally, unit transforms
(otherwise, unit reverts). If unit transforms,
grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates combat,
inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat and foe
cannot make a follow-up attack.

sabotage_atk_1.name: Sabotage Atk 1
sabotage_atk_1.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Atk-3 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_atk_2.name: Sabotage Atk 2
sabotage_atk_2.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Atk-5 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_atk_3.name: Sabotage Atk 3
sabotage_atk_3.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Atk-7 on that foe through its next action.

goad_beasts.name: Goad Beasts
goad_beasts.description:
Grants Atk/Spd+4 to beast allies within 2
spaces during combat.

ward_beasts.name: Ward Beasts
ward_beasts.description:
Grants Def/Res+4 to beast allies within 2
spaces during combat.

beast_valor_1.name: Beast Valor 1
beast_valor_1.description:
While unit lives and uses beast damage, unit
gets 1.5x SP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

beast_valor_2.name: Beast Valor 2
beast_valor_2.description:
While unit lives, all beast allies on team get
1.5x SP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

beast_valor_3.name: Beast Valor 3
beast_valor_3.description:
While unit lives, all beast allies on team get
2x SP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

dragonbind.name: Dragonbind
dragonbind.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

bonus_doubler_1.name: Bonus Doubler 1
bonus_doubler_1.description:
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = 50% of current bonus on each of
unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus
independently.

bonus_doubler_2.name: Bonus Doubler 2
bonus_doubler_2.description:
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = 75% of current bonus on each of
unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus
independently.

bonus_doubler_3.name: Bonus Doubler 3
bonus_doubler_3.description:
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats.
Calculates each stat bonus independently.

human_virtue.name: Human Virtue
human_virtue.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to any allies
that are not beast or dragon allies, grants
Atk/Spd+6 to unit and those allies for 1 turn.

argent_bow.name: Argent Bow
argent_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Spd-2. If unit
initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

eternal_tome.name: Eternal Tome
eternal_tome.description:
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against
colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.

glitnir.name: Glitnir
glitnir.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit initiates combat and foe
uses sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast
damage, grants Atk+6 during combat, and if
unit initiates combat against a foe that can
counter, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack.

vanguard.name: Vanguard
vanguard.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Def+7 during
combat.

vanguard+.name: Vanguard+
vanguard+.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Def+7 during
combat.

gronnserpent.name: Gronnserpent
gronnserpent.description:
If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger,
magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

gronnserpent+.name: Gronnserpent+
gronnserpent+.description:
If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger,
magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

short_bow.name: Short Bow
short_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Deals +10 damage
when Special triggers.

short_bow+.name: Short Bow+
short_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. Deals +10 damage
when Special triggers.

demonic_breath.name: Demonic Breath
demonic_breath.description:
Grants Def+3. Effective against armored
foes. At start of combat, if a negative status
effect is active on unit, or if unit's HP < 100%,
neutralizes penalties on unit and grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def and Res.

rally_up_res.name: Rally Up Res
rally_up_res.description:
Grants Res+4 to target ally and allies within
2 spaces of target (excluding unit) for 1 turn.

rally_up_res+.name: Rally Up Res+
rally_up_res+.description:
Grants Res+6 to target ally and allies within
2 spaces of target (excluding unit) for 1 turn.

seal_spd_def_1.name: Seal Spd/Def 1
seal_spd_def_1.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe through its next action
after combat.

seal_spd_def_2.name: Seal Spd/Def 2
seal_spd_def_2.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-5 on foe through its next action
after combat.

hone_spd_4.name: Hone Spd 4
hone_spd_4.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd+7 to adjacent allies for
1 turn.

flashing_carrot.name: Flashing Carrot
flashing_carrot.description:
At start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2 during combat.

flashing_carrot+.name: Flashing Carrot+
flashing_carrot+.description:
At start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2 during combat.

beguiling_bow.name: Beguiling Bow
beguiling_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if foe’s HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2
during combat.

beguiling_bow+.name: Beguiling Bow+
beguiling_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. At start of combat,
if foe’s HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2
during combat.

pegasus_carrot.name: Pegasus Carrot
pegasus_carrot.description:
Effective against armored foes. If unit has
weapon-triangle advantage, neutralizes effects
that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during
combat. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-5 on target and foes within 2 spaces
of target through their next actions.

pegasus_carrot+.name: Pegasus Carrot+
pegasus_carrot+.description:
Effective against armored foes. If unit has
weapon-triangle advantage, neutralizes effects
that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during
combat. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces
of target through their next actions.

ve\u00f0rf\u00f6lnirs_egg.name: Veðrfölnir's Egg
ve\u00f0rf\u00f6lnirs_egg.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during
combat.

ovoid_staff.name: Ovoid Staff
ovoid_staff.description:
At start of turn, restores 5 HP to unit and
adjacent allies.

ovoid_staff+.name: Ovoid Staff+
ovoid_staff+.description:
At start of turn, restores 7 HP to unit and
adjacent allies.

atk_def_push_1.name: Atk/Def Push 1
atk_def_push_1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%,
grants Atk/Def+3, but if unit attacked, deals
1 damage to unit after combat.

atk_def_push_2.name: Atk/Def Push 2
atk_def_push_2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%,
grants Atk/Def+4, but if unit attacked, deals
1 damage to unit after combat.

atk_def_push_3.name: Atk/Def Push 3
atk_def_push_3.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%,
grants Atk/Def+5, but if unit attacked, deals
1 damage to unit after combat.

g_duel_flying_1.name: G Duel Flying 1
g_duel_flying_1.description:
Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's
stats as 160 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

g_duel_flying_2.name: G Duel Flying 2
g_duel_flying_2.description:
Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's
stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

g_duel_flying_3.name: G Duel Flying 3
g_duel_flying_3.description:
Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

spd_def_link_1.name: Spd/Def Link 1
spd_def_link_1.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Spd/Def+2 to unit and target ally
or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd_def_link_2.name: Spd/Def Link 2
spd_def_link_2.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Spd/Def+4 to unit and target ally
or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

spd_def_link_3.name: Spd/Def Link 3
spd_def_link_3.description:
If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition,
Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets
unit, grants Spd/Def+6 to unit and target ally
or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

disarm_trap_1.name: Disarm Trap 1
disarm_trap_1.description:
While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends
movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a
Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 1, cancels
trap's effect.

disarm_trap_2.name: Disarm Trap 2
disarm_trap_2.description:
While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends
movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a
Heavy Trap and that trap's level ≤ 3, cancels
trap's effect.

disarm_trap_3.name: Disarm Trap 3
disarm_trap_3.description:
While attacking in Aether Raids, if unit ends
movement on a space with a Bolt Trap or a
Heavy Trap, cancels trap's effect.

chaos_manifest.name: Chaos Manifest
chaos_manifest.description:
Grants Res+3. If a penalty inflicted by a skill like
Panic or Threaten and/or a negative status
effect (preventing counterattacks or restricting
movement) is active on foe, grants Atk+6
during combat and unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack.

sabotage_res_1.name: Sabotage Res 1
sabotage_res_1.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Res-3 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_res_2.name: Sabotage Res 2
sabotage_res_2.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Res-5 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_res_3.name: Sabotage Res 3
sabotage_res_3.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Res-7 on that foe through its next action.

chaos_named.name: Chaos Named
chaos_named.description:
At start of turn, if foes within 3 columns
centered on unit have Res ≤ unit's Res-3,
inflicts -5 on the highest of those foes'
Atk/Spd/Def/Res through their next actions.
(When calculating highest stat, treats Atk
as -15. Calculates each stat penalty
independently.)

bull_blade.name: Bull Blade
bull_blade.description:
During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Def
by number of allies within 2 spaces × 2.
(Maximum bonus of +6 to each stat.)

panther_lance.name: Panther Lance
panther_lance.description:
During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Def
by number of allies within 2 spaces × 2.
(Maximum bonus of +6 to each stat.)

sabertooth_fang.name: Sabertooth Fang
sabertooth_fang.description:
Grants Def+3. If a movement Assist skill (like
Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit
or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on
foes within 2 spaces of unit and target through
their next actions after movement. At start of
turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon
allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

whelp_(armored).name: Whelp (Armored)
whelp_(armored).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

yearling_(arm).name: Yearling (Arm.)
yearling_(arm).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

adult_(armored).name: Adult (Armored)
adult_(armored).description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

lion_king_fang.name: Lion King Fang
lion_king_fang.description:
Grants Atk+3. If foe initiates combat, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat. At start of
turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon
allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

covert_cat_fang.name: Covert Cat Fang
covert_cat_fang.description:
Grants Def+3. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Def+3 to unit and allies within
2 spaces of unit during combat. At start of turn,
if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies
or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates
combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during
combat and foe cannot make a follow-up
attack.

brazen_cat_fang.name: Brazen Cat Fang
brazen_cat_fang.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+6 during combat. At start of
turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon
allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates
combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

rally_atk_def+.name: Rally Atk/Def+
rally_atk_def+.description: Grants Atk/Def+6 to target ally for 1 turn.

distant_def_4.name: Distant Def 4
distant_def_4.description:
If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger,
magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+8 and
neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like
Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

spd_def_solo_1.name: Spd/Def Solo 1
spd_def_solo_1.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Def+2 during combat.

spd_def_solo_2.name: Spd/Def Solo 2
spd_def_solo_2.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Def+4 during combat.

spd_def_solo_3.name: Spd/Def Solo 3
spd_def_solo_3.description:
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Def+6 during combat.

beast_exp_1.name: Beast Exp. 1
beast_exp_1.description:
While unit lives and uses beast damage, unit
gets 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

beast_exp_2.name: Beast Exp. 2
beast_exp_2.description:
While unit lives, all beast allies on team get
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

beast_exp_3.name: Beast Exp. 3
beast_exp_3.description:
While unit lives, all beast allies on team get
2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

luncheon_lance.name: Luncheon Lance
luncheon_lance.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during
combat.

luncheon_lance+.name: Luncheon Lance+
luncheon_lance+.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during
combat.

eldhr\u00edmnir.name: Eldhrímnir
eldhr\u00edmnir.description:
Effective against beast foes. Grants Spd+3. At
start of combat, if unit's Res > foe's Res,
reduces foe's Atk/Spd by 50% of difference
between stats during combat. (Calculates
reduction before combat. Maximum penalty
of -8.)

s\u00e6hr\u00edmnir.name: Sæhrímnir
s\u00e6hr\u00edmnir.description:
Effective against beast foes. Grants Atk+3. At
start of combat, if unit's Res > foe's Res,
reduces foe's Atk/Def by 50% of difference
between stats during combat. (Calculates
reduction before combat. Maximum penalty
of -8.) After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces
of target through their next actions.

sandwiches!.name: Sandwiches!
sandwiches!.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+4 during
combat.

sandwiches!+.name: Sandwiches!+
sandwiches!+.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Res+4 during
combat.

toasty_skewer.name: Toasty Skewer
toasty_skewer.description:
If a foe initiates combat against an ally within
2 spaces of unit, grants Def/Res+3 to that ally
during combat.

toasty_skewer+.name: Toasty Skewer+
toasty_skewer+.description:
If a foe initiates combat against an ally within
2 spaces of unit, grants Def/Res+3 to that ally
during combat.

ar-o_atk_def_1.name: AR-O Atk/Def 1
ar-o_atk_def_1.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +4; 3 grants +3; 4 grants +2; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-o_atk_def_2.name: AR-O Atk/Def 2
ar-o_atk_def_2.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +7; 3 grants +5; 4 grants +3; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-o_atk_def_3.name: AR-O Atk/Def 3
ar-o_atk_def_3.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +10; 3 grants +7; 4 grants +4; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_atk_res_1.name: AR-D Atk/Res 1
ar-d_atk_res_1.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_atk_res_2.name: AR-D Atk/Res 2
ar-d_atk_res_2.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_atk_res_3.name: AR-D Atk/Res 3
ar-d_atk_res_3.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

def_opening_1.name: Def Opening 1
def_opening_1.description:
At start of turn, grants Def+2 to ally with the
highest Def for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

def_opening_2.name: Def Opening 2
def_opening_2.description:
At start of turn, grants Def+4 to ally with the
highest Def for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

def_opening_3.name: Def Opening 3
def_opening_3.description:
At start of turn, grants Def+6 to ally with the
highest Def for 1 turn. (Excludes unit.)

luna_arc.name: Luna Arc
luna_arc.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Spd+3.
If unit initiates combat, deals damage = 25%
of foe's Def. (Ignores reductions to Def from
special skills like Lunar Flash.)

lunar_flash.name: Lunar Flash
lunar_flash.description:
Treats foe’s Def/Res as if reduced by 20%
during combat. Boosts damage by 20% of
unit's Spd.

darting_blow_4.name: Darting Blow 4
darting_blow_4.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+9 during
combat.

panther_sword.name: Panther Sword
panther_sword.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk
by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage,
reduces Atk by 20%.

bull_spear.name: Bull Spear
bull_spear.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk
by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage,
reduces Atk by 20%.

bow_of_devotion.name: Bow of Devotion
bow_of_devotion.description:
Effective against flying foes. If foe initiates
combat and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during
combat.

shadow_sword.name: Shadow Sword
shadow_sword.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat,
unit can make a follow-up attack before foe
can counterattack.

kriemhild.name: Kriemhild
kriemhild.description:
If a bow, dagger, magic, or staff foe initiates
combat and unit is within 2 spaces of an ally,
unit can counterattack regardless of foe's
range and foe cannot make a follow-up attack,
but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 20
damage to nearest ally.

death.name: Death
death.description:
Grants Res+3. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4
during combat. After combat, if unit attacked,
deals 4 damage to unit.

razing_breath.name: Razing Breath
razing_breath.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower
of foe's Def or Res.

savage_breath.name: Savage Breath
savage_breath.description:
Grants Atk+3. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+X.
(Calculates X based on number of allies within
2 spaces of unit: 0 allies grants +6; 1 ally
grants +4; 2 allies grants +2; ≥3 allies grants
+0.) If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage
using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

warding_stance_4.name: Warding Stance 4
warding_stance_4.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Res+8 during
combat and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1
on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

flashing_blade_4.name: Flashing Blade 4
flashing_blade_4.description:
If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special
cooldown charge +1 and deals +5 damage per
unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

sudden_panic_1.name: Sudden Panic 1
sudden_panic_1.description:
$aAt start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-5
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
【Panic】on that foe.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

sudden_panic_2.name: Sudden Panic 2
sudden_panic_2.description:
$aAt start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
【Panic】on that foe.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

sudden_panic_3.name: Sudden Panic 3
sudden_panic_3.description:
$aAt start of turn, if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-1
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
【Panic】on that foe.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

solitary_dream.name: Solitary Dream
solitary_dream.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only
dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and unit
can move 1 extra space. (That turn only. Does
not stack.)

cake_cutter.name: Cake Cutter
cake_cutter.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during
combat.

cake_cutter+.name: Cake Cutter+
cake_cutter+.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during
combat.

lofty_blossoms.name: Lofty Blossoms
lofty_blossoms.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during
combat.

lofty_blossoms+.name: Lofty Blossoms+
lofty_blossoms+.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during
combat.

bouquet_bow.name: Bouquet Bow
bouquet_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates
combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

bouquet_bow+.name: Bouquet Bow+
bouquet_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates
combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

vessel_of_cheer.name: Vessel of Cheer
vessel_of_cheer.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during
combat.

vessel_of_cheer+.name: Vessel of Cheer+
vessel_of_cheer+.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during
combat.

gjallarbr\u00fa.name: Gjallarbrú
gjallarbr\u00fa.description:
$aCalculates damage from staff like other weapons.
At start of turn, if foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3 and foe
is in cardinal directions, inflicts【Isolation】on
foe.

【Isolation】
Target cannot use or be the target of Assist
skills through its next action. (Target can
neither use nor be the target of skills like
Dance and Sing, skills that neutralize penalties,
like Restore and Harsh Command+, etc.)

harsh_command+.name: Harsh Command+
harsh_command+.description:
Neutralizes target ally's penalties (from skills
like Panic, Threaten, etc.) and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, etc.) that last through ally's next
action. Converts any penalties on target ally
into bonuses.

ar-d_spd_def_1.name: AR-D Spd/Def 1
ar-d_spd_def_1.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_spd_def_2.name: AR-D Spd/Def 2
ar-d_spd_def_2.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_spd_def_3.name: AR-D Spd/Def 3
ar-d_spd_def_3.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ground_orders_1.name: Ground Orders 1
ground_orders_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit's HP = 100%, grants the
following status to adjacent infantry, armored,
and cavalry allies for 1 turn: "Unit can move to
a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

ground_orders_2.name: Ground Orders 2
ground_orders_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants the
following status to adjacent infantry, armored,
and cavalry allies for 1 turn: "Unit can move to
a space adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces."

ground_orders_3.name: Ground Orders 3
ground_orders_3.description:
At start of turn, grants the following status to
adjacent infantry, armored, and cavalry allies
for 1 turn: "Unit can move to a space adjacent
to any ally within 2 spaces."

pulse_smoke_1.name: Pulse Smoke 1
pulse_smoke_1.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Special
cooldown count+1 on target and foes within
1 space of target after combat. (No effect on
Special cooldown counts already at maximum.)

pulse_smoke_2.name: Pulse Smoke 2
pulse_smoke_2.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Special
cooldown count+1 on target and foes within
2 spaces of target after combat. (No effect on
Special cooldown counts already at maximum.)

pulse_smoke_3.name: Pulse Smoke 3
pulse_smoke_3.description:
Inflicts Special cooldown count+1 on target
and foes within 2 spaces of target after
combat. (No effect on Special cooldown counts
already at maximum.)

divine_breath.name: Divine Breath
divine_breath.description:
Grants Atk+3. Effective against dragon foes.
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+X during combat.
(X = number of dragon allies and allies that
have "effective against dragons" within 2
spaces ×3. Maximum bonus of +9 to each stat.)
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

ar-o_atk_spd_1.name: AR-O Atk/Spd 1
ar-o_atk_spd_1.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +4; 3 grants +3; 4 grants +2; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-o_atk_spd_2.name: AR-O Atk/Spd 2
ar-o_atk_spd_2.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +7; 3 grants +5; 4 grants +3; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-o_atk_spd_3.name: AR-O Atk/Spd 3
ar-o_atk_spd_3.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Spd+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +10; 3 grants +7; 4 grants +4; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

divine_fang.name: Divine Fang
divine_fang.description:
At start of turn, grants "effective against
dragons" to adjacent allies for 1 turn.

umbra_burst.name: Umbra Burst
umbra_burst.description:
Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res. Deals a minimum of 1
damage.

umbra_blast.name: Umbra Blast
umbra_blast.description:
After combat, deals 5 damage to target and
foes within 2 spaces of target and then unit
and target foe swap spaces.

umbra_eruption.name: Umbra Eruption
umbra_eruption.description:
After combat, deals 10 damage to target and
foes within 2 spaces of target and then unit
and target foe swap spaces.

umbra_calamity.name: Umbra Calamity
umbra_calamity.description:
After combat, deals 15 damage to target and
foes within 2 spaces of target and then unit
and target foe swap spaces.

r\u00f8kkr.name: Røkkr
r\u00f8kkr.description:
Neutralizes damage outside of combat (from
skills like Poison Strike, etc.) except damage
dealt by Specials that trigger before combat.
Unit's HP can be reduced to 0 only by an
attack from allied armies. Unit cannot restore
its own HP.

saizos_star.name: Saizo's Star
saizos_star.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-6 on target and foes within 2
spaces of target through their next actions.

kageros_dart.name: Kagero's Dart
kageros_dart.description:
$aAt start of combat, if unit's Atk > foe's Atk,
grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

barrier_lance.name: Barrier Lance
barrier_lance.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Res+7 during
combat.

barrier_lance+.name: Barrier Lance+
barrier_lance+.description:
If foe initiates combat, grants Res+7 during
combat.

bunny_fang.name: Bunny Fang
bunny_fang.description:
$aGrants Spd+3. Effective against cavalry foes.
After combat, if unit's HP ≤ 75%, grants Special
cooldown count-2.
Effect:【Beast (Cavalry)】

【Beast (Cavalry)】
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

oracles_breath.name: Oracle's Breath
oracles_breath.description:
Grants Atk+3. If a bonus granted by a skill like
Rally or Hone is active on unit, foe cannot make
a follow-up attack. If foe's Range = 2, calculates
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res.

atk_res_push_1.name: Atk/Res Push 1
atk_res_push_1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants
Atk/Res+3, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage
to unit after combat.

atk_res_push_2.name: Atk/Res Push 2
atk_res_push_2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants
Atk/Res+4, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage
to unit after combat.

atk_res_push_3.name: Atk/Res Push 3
atk_res_push_3.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants
Atk/Res+5, but if unit attacked, deals 1 damage
to unit after combat.

ar-d_def_res_1.name: AR-D Def/Res 1
ar-d_def_res_1.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Def/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_def_res_2.name: AR-D Def/Res 2
ar-d_def_res_2.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Def/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_def_res_3.name: AR-D Def/Res 3
ar-d_def_res_3.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Def/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

infantry_breath_1.name: Infantry Breath 1
infantry_breath_1.description:
Adjacent infantry allies gain: "If foe initiates
combat, grants Special cooldown charge +1
per attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)"

infantry_breath_2.name: Infantry Breath 2
infantry_breath_2.description:
Adjacent infantry allies gain: "If foe initiates
combat, grants Def/Res+1 during combat and
Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only
highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

infantry_breath_3.name: Infantry Breath 3
infantry_breath_3.description:
Adjacent infantry allies gain: "If foe initiates
combat, grants Def/Res+2 during combat and
Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (Only
highest value applied. Does not stack.)"

sandfort_spade.name: Sandfort Spade
sandfort_spade.description:
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+4 during
combat.

sandfort_spade+.name: Sandfort Spade+
sandfort_spade+.description:
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+4 during
combat.

shoreline_rake.name: Shoreline Rake
shoreline_rake.description:
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+4 during
combat.

shoreline_rake+.name: Shoreline Rake+
shoreline_rake+.description:
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+4 during
combat.

tropical_treats.name: Tropical Treats
tropical_treats.description:
$aIf a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+4 during
combat.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

tropical_treats+.name: Tropical Treats+
tropical_treats+.description:
$aIf a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+4 during
combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

worldsea_wave.name: Worldsea Wave
worldsea_wave.description:
Grants Spd+3. If unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit
initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack.

buoyboard.name: Buoyboard
buoyboard.description:
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+4 during
combat.

buoyboard+.name: Buoyboard+
buoyboard+.description:
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
is active on unit, grants Atk/Res+4 during
combat.

swift_sparrow_3.name: Swift Sparrow 3
swift_sparrow_3.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Spd+7
during combat.

mirror_impact.name: Mirror Impact
mirror_impact.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6, Res+10
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

r_duel_infantry_1.name: R Duel Infantry 1
r_duel_infantry_1.description:
Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's
stats as 160 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

r_duel_infantry_2.name: R Duel Infantry 2
r_duel_infantry_2.description:
Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's
stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

r_duel_infantry_3.name: R Duel Infantry 3
r_duel_infantry_3.description:
Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

ar-o_spd_res_1.name: AR-O Spd/Res 1
ar-o_spd_res_1.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +4; 3 grants +3; 4 grants +2; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-o_spd_res_2.name: AR-O Spd/Res 2
ar-o_spd_res_2.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +7; 3 grants +5; 4 grants +3; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-o_spd_res_3.name: AR-O Spd/Res 3
ar-o_spd_res_3.description:
If attacking in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of foe's defensive structures: ≤2 structures
grants +10; 3 grants +7; 4 grants +4; ≥5 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ardent_durandal.name: Ardent Durandal
ardent_durandal.description:
$aGrants Atk+3. At start of turn, grants
【Bonus Doubler】to ally with the highest Atk.

【Bonus Doubler】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during
combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats
for 1 turn. Calculates each stat bonus
independently.

rally_spd_res+.name: Rally Spd/Res+
rally_spd_res+.description: Grants Spd/Res+6 to target ally for 1 turn.

vision_of_arcadia.name: Vision of Arcadia
vision_of_arcadia.description:
At start of turn, if a dragon or beast ally is
deployed, grants Atk/Def+6 to ally with the
highest Atk for 1 turn.

rowdy_sword.name: Rowdy Sword
rowdy_sword.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

spys_dagger.name: Spy's Dagger
spys_dagger.description:
$aAfter combat, if unit attacked, grants
Def/Res+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces of
unit for 1 turn.
Effect:【Dagger ６】

【Dagger ６】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-６ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

hermits_tome.name: Hermit's Tome
hermits_tome.description:
Effective against cavalry foes. If foe uses bow,
dagger, magic, or staff, neutralizes foe's
bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.)
during combat.

petal_parasol.name: Petal Parasol
petal_parasol.description:
$aIf【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

petal_parasol+.name: Petal Parasol+
petal_parasol+.description:
$aIf【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

deep-blue_bow.name: Deep-Blue Bow
deep-blue_bow.description:
Grants Spd+3. Effective against flying and
armored foes. If foe's HP = 100% and unit
initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4
during combat.

big-catch_bow.name: Big-Catch Bow
big-catch_bow.description:
$aEffective against flying foes. If【Penalty】is
active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

big-catch_bow+.name: Big-Catch Bow+
big-catch_bow+.description:
$aEffective against flying foes. If【Penalty】is
active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

broadleaf_fan.name: Broadleaf Fan
broadleaf_fan.description:
$aGrants bonus to unit's Atk = total penalties
on foe during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

broadleaf_fan+.name: Broadleaf Fan+
broadleaf_fan+.description:
$aGrants bonus to unit's Atk = total penalties
on foe during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

scallop_blade.name: Scallop Blade
scallop_blade.description:
$aIf【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

scallop_blade+.name: Scallop Blade+
scallop_blade+.description:
$aIf【Penalty】is active on foe, grants
Atk/Spd+5 during combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

brazen_atk_spd_4.name: Brazen Atk/Spd 4
brazen_atk_spd_4.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Atk+9 and Spd+10 during combat.

sabotage_def_1.name: Sabotage Def 1
sabotage_def_1.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Def-3 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_def_2.name: Sabotage Def 2
sabotage_def_2.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Def-5 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_def_3.name: Sabotage Def 3
sabotage_def_3.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Def-7 on that foe through its next action.

def_res_ruse_1.name: Def/Res Ruse 1
def_res_ruse_1.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Def/Res-1 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)
