def_res_ruse_2.name: Def/Res Ruse 2
def_res_ruse_2.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Def/Res-3 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

def_res_ruse_3.name: Def/Res Ruse 3
def_res_ruse_3.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Def/Res-5 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

creator_sword.name: Creator Sword
creator_sword.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
During combat, neutralizes effects that
guarantee foe's follow-up attacks, prevent
unit's follow-up attacks, grant "Special
cooldown charge +X" to foe, or inflict "Special
cooldown charge -X" on unit.

noble_lance.name: Noble Lance
noble_lance.description:
Grants Atk+3. At start of combat, if both unit's
and foe's HP = 100% or if both unit's and foe's
HP < 100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack.

victorious_axe.name: Victorious Axe
victorious_axe.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If the number of foes within 2 spaces
(excluding target) ≥ the number of allies within
2 spaces (excluding unit), unit makes a
guaranteed follow-up attack.

cunning_bow.name: Cunning Bow
cunning_bow.description:
Grants Spd+3. Effective against flying foes.
When total bonuses on unit + total penalties
on foe ≥ 10, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe
during combat. (Example: if unit has a +5 bonus
and foe has a -5 penalty, the calculated total
will be 10.)

athame.name: Athame
athame.description:
$aGrants Res+3. At start of combat, if foe’s HP <
100%, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat, and if
foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack
before foe’s first attack.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

ruptured_sky.name: Ruptured Sky
ruptured_sky.description:
Boosts damage by 20% of foe's Atk. If in
combat against a dragon foe or beast foe,
boosts damage by 40% instead of 20%.

lull_atk_def_1.name: Lull Atk/Def 1
lull_atk_def_1.description:
Inflicts Atk/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk_def_2.name: Lull Atk/Def 2
lull_atk_def_2.description:
Inflicts Atk/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk_def_3.name: Lull Atk/Def 3
lull_atk_def_3.description:
Inflicts Atk/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd_def_1.name: Lull Spd/Def 1
lull_spd_def_1.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd_def_2.name: Lull Spd/Def 2
lull_spd_def_2.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_spd_def_3.name: Lull Spd/Def 3
lull_spd_def_3.description:
Inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Spd/Def (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

rouse_atk_def_1.name: Rouse Atk/Def 1
rouse_atk_def_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+2 to unit for 1 turn.

rouse_atk_def_2.name: Rouse Atk/Def 2
rouse_atk_def_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+4 to unit for 1 turn.

rouse_atk_def_3.name: Rouse Atk/Def 3
rouse_atk_def_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+6 to unit for 1 turn.

sublime_surge.name: Sublime Surge
sublime_surge.description:
Neutralizes "effective against dragons" bonuses.
Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

sirius.name: Sirius
sirius.description:
Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd. Restores
HP = 30% of damage dealt.

times_pulse_1.name: Time's Pulse 1
times_pulse_1.description:
At the start of every third turn, if Special
cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants
Special cooldown count-1.

times_pulse_2.name: Time's Pulse 2
times_pulse_2.description:
At start of odd-numbered turns, if Special
cooldown count is at its maximum value, grants
Special cooldown count-1.

times_pulse_3.name: Time's Pulse 3
times_pulse_3.description:
At start of turn, if Special cooldown count is at
its maximum value, grants Special cooldown
count-1.

selenas_blade.name: Selena's Blade
selenas_blade.description:
Effective against armored foes. At start of
combat, if foe's Atk ≥ unit's Atk+3, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

book_of_orchids.name: Book of Orchids
book_of_orchids.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during
combat.

inscribed_tome.name: Inscribed Tome
inscribed_tome.description:
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against
colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.

scythe_of_sariel.name: Scythe of Sariel
scythe_of_sariel.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone
and/or extra movement granted by a skill like
Armor March or Armored Boots is active on foe,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

freikugel.name: Freikugel
freikugel.description:
Grants Spd+3. At start of ally's combat, if unit
is within 2 spaces of any allies with Def > unit's
Def, grants Atk/Spd+4 to those allies during
combat.  At start of unit's combat, if unit is not
within 2 spaces of any allies with Def > unit's
Def, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat.

hunting_blade.name: Hunting Blade
hunting_blade.description:
$aAccelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against beast foes. At start of combat,
if unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res < that of an ally within
2 spaces, grants +5 to unit's corresponding
stat during combat. Calculates each stat bonus
independently.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

rau\u00f0rfox.name: Rauðrfox
rau\u00f0rfox.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.

rau\u00f0rfox+.name: Rauðrfox+
rau\u00f0rfox+.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts
Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foe
during combat.

atk_spd_form_1.name: Atk/Spd Form 1
atk_spd_form_1.description:
Grants Atk/Spd+X to unit during combat.
(X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

atk_spd_form_2.name: Atk/Spd Form 2

atk_spd_form_3.name: Atk/Spd Form 3

ar-d_spd_res_1.name: AR-D Spd/Res 1
ar-d_spd_res_1.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_spd_res_2.name: AR-D Spd/Res 2
ar-d_spd_res_2.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_spd_res_3.name: AR-D Spd/Res 3
ar-d_spd_res_3.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Spd/Res+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

inf_hexblade_1.name: Inf. Hexblade 1
inf_hexblade_1.description:
If adjacent infantry allies use sword, lance, axe,
bow, or dagger, calculates their damage using
the lower of foe's Def or Res during combat.
(Does not affect damage dealt by Specials that
trigger before combat.)

inf_hexblade_2.name: Inf. Hexblade 2
inf_hexblade_2.description:
If adjacent infantry allies use sword, lance, axe,
bow, or dagger, grants Atk/Spd+1 to those allies
and calculates their damage using the lower of
foe's Def or Res during combat. (Does not
affect damage dealt by Specials that trigger
before combat.)

inf_hexblade_3.name: Inf. Hexblade 3
inf_hexblade_3.description:
If adjacent infantry allies use sword, lance, axe,
bow, or dagger, grants Atk/Spd+2 to those allies
and calculates their damage using the lower of
foe's Def or Res during combat. (Does not
affect damage dealt by Specials that trigger
before combat.)

dracofalchion.name: Dracofalchion
dracofalchion.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Grants Atk+3. If
the number of foes within 2 spaces (excluding
target) ≥ the number of allies within 2 spaces
(excluding unit), grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5
during combat.

niniss_ice_lance.name: Ninis's Ice Lance
niniss_ice_lance.description:
Effective against dragon and beast foes.
Grants Spd+3. If unit initiates combat, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

light_of_dawn.name: Light of Dawn
light_of_dawn.description:
Effective against armored and cavalry foes.
Grants Res+3. Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res
during combat = current penalty on each of
target's stats. Calculates each stat bonus
independently.

sanngri\u00f0r.name: Sanngriðr
sanngri\u00f0r.description:
$aFoe cannot counterattack. If unit initiates
combat, grants Atk/Spd+3 during combat.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts【Gravity】
on target and foes within 1 space of target.

【Gravity】
Restricts target's movement to 1 space through
its next action.

scendscale.name: Scendscale
scendscale.description:
Deals damage = 25% of unit's Atk, but after
combat, if unit attacked, deals 7 damage to
unit.

atk_res_bond_4.name: Atk/Res Bond 4
atk_res_bond_4.description:
If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Res+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's
penalties to Atk/Res during combat.

atk_spd_push_4.name: Atk/Spd Push 4
atk_spd_push_4.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%,
grants Atk/Spd+7, but after combat, if unit
attacked, deals 5 damage to unit.

yunes_whispers.name: Yune's Whispers
yunes_whispers.description:
At start of turn, if any foe's Res ≤ unit's Res-3
and that foe is adjacent to another foe, inflicts
Atk/Spd-6 on that foe through its next action.

atk_spd_ruse_1.name: Atk/Spd Ruse 1
atk_spd_ruse_1.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-1 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk_spd_ruse_2.name: Atk/Spd Ruse 2
atk_spd_ruse_2.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk_spd_ruse_3.name: Atk/Spd Ruse 3
atk_spd_ruse_3.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

threat_atk_spd_1.name: Threat. Atk/Spd 1
threat_atk_spd_1.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

threat_atk_spd_2.name: Threat. Atk/Spd 2
threat_atk_spd_2.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

threat_atk_spd_3.name: Threat. Atk/Spd 3
threat_atk_spd_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a
foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit for 1 turn and
inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces
through their next actions.

virtuous_naga.name: Virtuous Naga
virtuous_naga.description:
Effective against dragon foes. Grants Atk+3.
At start of combat, if unit’s Atk > foe’s Atk,
grants Atk/Res+6 during combat.

light_and_dark.name: Light and Dark
light_and_dark.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-2 on foe, neutralizes
foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally,
etc.), and disables foe's skills that "calculate
damage using the lower of foe's Def or Res"
during combat.

atk_res_oath_1.name: Atk/Res Oath 1
atk_res_oath_1.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Res+3 to unit for 1 turn.

atk_res_oath_2.name: Atk/Res Oath 2
atk_res_oath_2.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Res+4 to unit for 1 turn.

atk_res_oath_3.name: Atk/Res Oath 3
atk_res_oath_3.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Res+5 to unit for 1 turn.

ver\u00f0andi.name: Verðandi
ver\u00f0andi.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to target.

fiddlestick_bow.name: Fiddlestick Bow
fiddlestick_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Def/Res+4
to allies within 2 spaces during combat against
sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast foes.

fiddlestick_bow+.name: Fiddlestick Bow+
fiddlestick_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants Def/Res+4
to allies within 2 spaces during combat against
sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast foes.

m\u00f6g\u00ferasir.name: Mögþrasir
m\u00f6g\u00ferasir.description:
Inflicts Spd-2. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

silver_goblet.name: Silver Goblet
silver_goblet.description:
Grants Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat against bow, dagger, magic,
or staff foes.

silver_goblet+.name: Silver Goblet+
silver_goblet+.description:
Grants Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat against bow, dagger, magic,
or staff foes.

vaf\u00fer\u00fa\u00f0nir.name: Vafþrúðnir
vaf\u00fer\u00fa\u00f0nir.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

b_duel_infantry_1.name: B Duel Infantry 1
b_duel_infantry_1.description:
Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's
stats as 160 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

b_duel_infantry_2.name: B Duel Infantry 2
b_duel_infantry_2.description:
Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's
stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

b_duel_infantry_3.name: B Duel Infantry 3
b_duel_infantry_3.description:
Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

caldera_dance_1.name: Caldera Dance 1
caldera_dance_1.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 and
Def+3 to target.

caldera_dance_2.name: Caldera Dance 2
caldera_dance_2.description:
If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 and
Def+4 to target.

joint_hone_atk.name: Joint Hone Atk
joint_hone_atk.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk+5 to unit and adjacent allies for
1 turn.

rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.description:
Effective against armored and cavalry foes.
Grants Spd+3. If unit’s HP ≤ 75% and foe
initiates combat, unit can counterattack
before foe's first attack.

mercurius.name: Mercurius
mercurius.description:
Grants Atk+3. At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥
50%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and
sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast allies
within 2 spaces for 1 turn. (Bonus granted to
unit even if no allies are within 2 spaces.)

sable_lance.name: Sable Lance
sable_lance.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

ethereal_breath.name: Ethereal Breath
ethereal_breath.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
Effective against dragon foes. Grants weapon-
triangle advantage against colorless foes, and
inflicts weapon-triangle disadvantage on
colorless foes during combat. Reduces damage
from area-of-effect Specials by 80% (excluding
Røkkr area-of-effect Specials). If foe's Range =
2, calculates damage using the lower of foe's
Def or Res.

spd_def_form_1.name: Spd/Def Form 1
spd_def_form_1.description:
Grants Spd/Def+X to unit during combat.
(X = number of allies within 2 spaces; max 3.)

spd_def_form_2.name: Spd/Def Form 2

spd_def_form_3.name: Spd/Def Form 3

brazen_spd_def_1.name: Brazen Spd/Def 1
brazen_spd_def_1.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Def+3 during combat.

brazen_spd_def_2.name: Brazen Spd/Def 2
brazen_spd_def_2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Def+5 during combat.

brazen_spd_def_3.name: Brazen Spd/Def 3
brazen_spd_def_3.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Def+7 during combat.

lull_atk_spd_1.name: Lull Atk/Spd 1
lull_atk_spd_1.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-1 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk_spd_2.name: Lull Atk/Spd 2
lull_atk_spd_2.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-2 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

lull_atk_spd_3.name: Lull Atk/Spd 3
lull_atk_spd_3.description:
Inflicts Atk/Spd-3 on foe and neutralizes foe's
bonuses to Atk/Spd (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.) during combat.

killing_intent.name: Killing Intent
killing_intent.description:
$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP < 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, inflicts
Spd/Res-5 on foe, and if unit initiates combat,
unit can make a follow-up attack before foe
can counterattack.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

panic_smoke_1.name: Panic Smoke 1
panic_smoke_1.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, inflicts【Panic】
on target and foes within 1 space of target
after combat.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

panic_smoke_2.name: Panic Smoke 2
panic_smoke_2.description:
$aIf unit initiates combat, inflicts【Panic】
on target and foes within 2 spaces of target
after combat.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

panic_smoke_3.name: Panic Smoke 3
panic_smoke_3.description:
$aInflicts【Panic】on target and foes
within 2 spaces of target after combat.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

dignified_bow.name: Dignified Bow
dignified_bow.description:
$aEffective against flying foes. At start of turn,
if any foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-1 and that foe is
adjacent to another foe, inflicts【Panic】on
that foe.

【Panic】
Converts bonuses on target into penalties
through its next action.

conjurer_curios.name: Conjurer Curios
conjurer_curios.description:
Effective against armored foes. Grants Atk+3.
If it is an odd-numbered turn or if foe's
HP < 100% at start of combat, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

candlewax_bow.name: Candlewax Bow
candlewax_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

candlewax_bow+.name: Candlewax Bow+
candlewax_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. Grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

pumpkin-a-box.name: Pumpkin-a-Box
pumpkin-a-box.description:
$aGrants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

pumpkin-a-box+.name: Pumpkin-a-Box+
pumpkin-a-box+.description:
$aGrants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

spooky_censer.name: Spooky Censer
spooky_censer.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

spooky_censer+.name: Spooky Censer+
spooky_censer+.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

madness_flask.name: Madness Flask
madness_flask.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

madness_flask+.name: Madness Flask+
madness_flask+.description:
Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. After combat,
deals 6 damage to unit.

ar-d_atk_def_1.name: AR-D Atk/Def 1
ar-d_atk_def_1.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +4; 4 grants +3; 3 grants +2; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_atk_def_2.name: AR-D Atk/Def 2
ar-d_atk_def_2.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +7; 4 grants +5; 3 grants +3; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

ar-d_atk_def_3.name: AR-D Atk/Def 3
ar-d_atk_def_3.description:
If defending in Aether Raids, grants Atk/Def+X
during combat. (Calculates X based on number
of your defensive structures: ≥5 structures
grants +10; 4 grants +7; 3 grants +4; ≤2 grants
+1. Destroyed defensive structures are not
counted.)

odd_follow-up_1.name: Odd Follow-Up 1
odd_follow-up_1.description:
If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP =
100%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up
attack and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

odd_follow-up_2.name: Odd Follow-Up 2
odd_follow-up_2.description:
If it is an odd-numbered turn and unit's HP ≥
50%, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.

odd_follow-up_3.name: Odd Follow-Up 3
odd_follow-up_3.description:
If it is an odd-numbered turn, unit makes a
guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot
make a follow-up attack.

spd_res_ruse_1.name: Spd/Res Ruse 1
spd_res_ruse_1.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-1 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd_res_ruse_2.name: Spd/Res Ruse 2
spd_res_ruse_2.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-3 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

spd_res_ruse_3.name: Spd/Res Ruse 3
spd_res_ruse_3.description:
$aIf a Rally Assist skill is used by unit or targets
unit, inflicts Spd/Res-5 and【Guard】on
foes in cardinal directions of unit and target
through their next actions.

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk_res_gap_1.name: Atk/Res Gap 1
atk_res_gap_1.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Res+1 to ally
with the highest Atk+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

atk_res_gap_2.name: Atk/Res Gap 2
atk_res_gap_2.description:
At start of turn, grants Atk/Res+3 to ally
with the highest Atk+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

atk_res_gap_3.name: Atk/Res Gap 3
atk_res_gap_3.description:

with the highest Atk+Res total for 1 turn.
(Excludes unit.)

astra_blade.name: Astra Blade
astra_blade.description:
Grants Atk+3. If unit's Atk > foe's Def, deals

sol_lance.name: Sol Lance
sol_lance.description:
Grants Res+3. When unit deals damage to foe
during combat, restores 10 HP to unit.
(Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

melancholy.name: Melancholy
melancholy.description:
$aAfter combat, if unit attacked, resets Special
cooldown of foe, and inflicts【Guard】on foe.
(Neutralizes Special cooldown count reductions
after combat, but skills that Accelerate and
Slow Special are still effective.)

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

melancholy+.name: Melancholy+
melancholy+.description:
$aAfter combat, if unit attacked, resets Special
cooldown of target and foes within 2 spaces of
target, and inflicts【Guard】on target and foes
within 2 spaces of target. (Neutralizes Special
cooldown count reductions after combat, but
skills that Accelerate and Slow Special are still
effective.)

【Guard】
Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on target
per attack during combat through its next action.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

atk_spd_bond_4.name: Atk/Spd Bond 4
atk_spd_bond_4.description:

Atk/Spd+7 to unit and neutralizes unit's

joint_hone_def.name: Joint Hone Def
joint_hone_def.description:
At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Def+5 to unit and adjacent allies for
1 turn.

staff_exp_1.name: Staff Exp. 1
staff_exp_1.description:
While unit lives and uses a staff, unit gets
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

staff_exp_2.name: Staff Exp. 2
staff_exp_2.description:
While unit lives, all staff allies on team get
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

staff_exp_3.name: Staff Exp. 3
staff_exp_3.description:
While unit lives, all staff allies on team get
2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

meisterbogen.name: Meisterbogen
meisterbogen.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Spd-5.
Unit attacks twice (even if foe initiates combat).
When under player's control, unit gains: "If unit
initiates combat, foe cannot make a follow-up
attack."

nj\u00f6runs_zeal.name: Njörun's Zeal
nj\u00f6runs_zeal.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants another action
to unit after combat. (Once per turn.) When
Special triggers, inflicts "restricts movement
to 1 space" on unit and Pair Up cohort through
their next action.

atk_res_push_4.name: Atk/Res Push 4

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants

golden_naginata.name: Golden Naginata
golden_naginata.description:
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if foe's Atk ≥ unit's Atk+3,

renowned_bow.name: Renowned Bow
renowned_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Spd-5.
If unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

sun_dragonstone.name: Sun Dragonstone
sun_dragonstone.description:
If foe initiates combat or if a bonus granted by
a skill like Rally or Hone is not active on foe,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

reginleif.name: Reginleif
reginleif.description:

Grants Atk+3. If unit’s Atk > foe’s Atk and/or

active on unit, unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack.

rau\u00f0rserpent.name: Rauðrserpent
rau\u00f0rserpent.description:
If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger,
magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

rau\u00f0rserpent+.name: Rauðrserpent+
rau\u00f0rserpent+.description:
If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger,
magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+6 during combat.

heavy_blade_4.name: Heavy Blade 4
heavy_blade_4.description:

to foe per unit's attack. (Only highest value

sabotage_spd_1.name: Sabotage Spd 1
sabotage_spd_1.description:

Spd-3 on that foe through its next action.

sabotage_spd_2.name: Sabotage Spd 2
sabotage_spd_2.description:

sabotage_spd_3.name: Sabotage Spd 3

1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

dagger_exp_2.name: Dagger Exp. 2
dagger_exp_2.description:

1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

dagger_exp_3.name: Dagger Exp. 3
dagger_exp_3.description:

2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

rearguard.name: Rearguard

rearguard+.name: Rearguard+

combat.

spaces of target through their next actions.

$aGrants Res+3. At start of combat, if【Penalty】

Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Res+3 during combat.

brazen_spd_res_2.name: Brazen Spd/Res 2
brazen_spd_res_2.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Res+5 during combat.

brazen_spd_res_3.name: Brazen Spd/Res 3
brazen_spd_res_3.description:
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≤ 80%, grants
Spd/Res+7 during combat.

spd_res_gap_1.name: Spd/Res Gap 1
spd_res_gap_1.description:
At start of turn, grants Spd/Res+1 to ally

spd_res_gap_2.name: Spd/Res Gap 2
spd_res_gap_2.description:

spd_res_gap_3.name: Spd/Res Gap 3

brave_sword+.description:

ruby_sword+.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk

eckesachs.name: Eckesachs

durandal.name: Durandal

If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during

sol_katti.name: Sol Katti

yato.name: Yato
yato.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during

raijinto.name: Raijinto
raijinto.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

siegfried.name: Siegfried
siegfried.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

f\u00f3lkvangr.name: Fólkvangr

brave_lance.name: Brave Lance

brave_lance+.description:

sapphire_lance.name: Sapphire Lance
sapphire_lance.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk
by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage,
reduces Atk by 20%.

sapphire_lance+.name: Sapphire Lance+
sapphire_lance+.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk
by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage,
reduces Atk by 20%.

gradivus.name: Gradivus
gradivus.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

fensalir.name: Fensalir
fensalir.description:
At start of turn, inflicts Atk-4 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

brave_axe.name: Brave Axe
brave_axe.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

brave_axe+.name: Brave Axe+
brave_axe+.description:
Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

emerald_axe.name: Emerald Axe
emerald_axe.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk
by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage,
reduces Atk by 20%.

emerald_axe+.name: Emerald Axe+
emerald_axe+.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk
by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage,
reduces Atk by 20%.

armads.name: Armads
armads.description:
If unit’s HP ≥ 80% and foe initiates combat, unit

n\u00f3at\u00fan.name: Nóatún
n\u00f3at\u00fan.description:
If unit’s HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space

brave_bow.name: Brave Bow
brave_bow.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Spd-5.

brave_bow+.name: Brave Bow+
brave_bow+.description:
Effective against flying foes. Inflicts Spd-5.

killer_bow.name: Killer Bow

killer_bow+.name: Killer Bow+
killer_bow+.description:

assassins_bow.name: Assassin's Bow

assassins_bow+.name: Assassin's Bow+
assassins_bow+.description:

parthia.name: Parthia
parthia.description:
Effective against flying foes. If unit initiates

fujin_yumi.name: Fujin Yumi

iron_dagger.name: Iron Dagger
iron_dagger.description:

steel_dagger.name: Steel Dagger
steel_dagger.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-3
on foe through its next action.

silver_dagger.name: Silver Dagger
silver_dagger.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-5
on foe through its next action.

silver_dagger+.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7
on foe through its next action.

smoke_dagger.name: Smoke Dagger
smoke_dagger.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-4 on

actions.

smoke_dagger+.name: Smoke Dagger+
smoke_dagger+.description:

actions.

poison_dagger.name: Poison Dagger

poison_dagger+.description:

rogue_dagger.name: Rogue Dagger

rogue_dagger+.name: Rogue Dagger+

rau\u00f0rraven+.name: Rauðrraven+
rau\u00f0rraven+.description:

bl\u00e1rblade.name: Blárblade

bl\u00e1rblade+.description:

unit during combat.

bl\u00e1rraven.name: Blárraven
bl\u00e1rraven.description:
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against

bl\u00e1rraven+.name: Blárraven+
bl\u00e1rraven+.description:

colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.

aura.name: Aura

allies after combat.

valaskj\u00e1lf.name: Valaskjálf
valaskj\u00e1lf.description:
If unit’s HP ≤ 50% and foe initiates combat, unit
can counterattack before foe’s first attack.

gronnblade.name: Gronnblade
gronnblade.description:
Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1).
Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on
unit during combat.

gronnblade+.name: Gronnblade+
gronnblade+.description:
Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1).
Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on
unit during combat.

gronnraven.name: Gronnraven
gronnraven.description:
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against
colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.

gronnraven+.name: Gronnraven+
gronnraven+.description:
Grants weapon-triangle advantage against
colorless foes, and inflicts weapon-triangle
disadvantage on colorless foes during combat.

\u00e9liv\u00e1gar.name: Élivágar
\u00e9liv\u00e1gar.description:

within 2 spaces of target into penalties through
their next actions.

fear.name: Fear
fear.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk-6
on foe through its next action.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Spd-6
on foe through its next action.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.description:

action.

pain.name: Pain
pain.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, deals 10 damage
to foe.

panic.name: Panic
panic.description:
After combat, if unit attacked, converts bonuses
on foe into penalties through its next action.

light_breath.name: Light Breath
light_breath.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 to
adjacent allies for 1 turn after combat.

light_breath+.name: Light Breath+
light_breath+.description:
If unit initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 to
adjacent allies for 1 turn after combat.

dark_breath.name: Dark Breath
dark_breath.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foes
within 2 spaces of target through their next actions
after combat.

dark_breath+.name: Dark Breath+
dark_breath+.description:
If unit initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on foes
within 2 spaces of target through their next actions
after combat.

lightning_breath.name: Lightning Breath
lightning_breath.description:
Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Unit
can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

lightning_breath+.name: Lightning Breath+
lightning_breath+.description:
Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Unit
can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

physic.name: Physic
physic.description: Restores 8 HP to target ally. Range = 2.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description:

reconcile.name: Reconcile
reconcile.description: Restores 7 HP to unit and target ally.

martyr.name: Martyr
martyr.description:

Restores X HP to target (X = damage dealt to

rehabilitate.name: Rehabilitate
rehabilitate.description:
Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). If
target's HP is ≤ 50%, the lower the target's HP,
the more HP is restored. (Minimum of 7 HP.)

swap.name: Swap
swap.description: Unit and target ally swap spaces.

draw_back.name: Draw Back
draw_back.description:
Unit moves 1 space away from target ally. Ally

reposition.name: Reposition
reposition.description: Target ally moves to opposite side of unit.

pivot.name: Pivot
pivot.description: Unit moves to opposite side of target ally.

rally_attack.name: Rally Attack
rally_attack.description: Grants Atk+4 to target ally for 1 turn.

rally_speed.name: Rally Speed
rally_speed.description: Grants Spd+4 to target ally for 1 turn.

rally_defense.name: Rally Defense
rally_defense.description: Grants Def+4 to target ally for 1 turn.

rally_resistance.name: Rally Resistance
rally_resistance.description: Grants Res+4 to target ally for 1 turn.

ardent_sacrifice.name: Ardent Sacrifice
ardent_sacrifice.description:

harsh_command.name: Harsh Command
harsh_command.description: Converts penalties on target into bonuses.

reciprocal_aid.name: Reciprocal Aid
reciprocal_aid.description:

sing.name: Sing
sing.description:

dance.name: Dance
dance.description:

new_moon.name: New Moon

moonbow.name: Moonbow
moonbow.description:
Treats foe’s Def/Res as if reduced by 30% during
combat.

luna.name: Luna

reprisal.name: Reprisal

vengeance.name: Vengeance
vengeance.description: Boosts damage by 50% of damage dealt to unit.

dragon_gaze.name: Dragon Gaze
dragon_gaze.description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Atk.

draconic_aura.name: Draconic Aura

dragon_fang.name: Dragon Fang
dragon_fang.description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Atk.

glowing_ember.name: Glowing Ember

bonfire.name: Bonfire

ignis.name: Ignis

chilling_wind.name: Chilling Wind
chilling_wind.description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Res.

iceberg.name: Iceberg
iceberg.description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Res.

glacies.name: Glacies
glacies.description: Boosts damage by 80% of unit's Res.

rising_wind.name: Rising Wind
rising_wind.description:
Before combat this unit initiates, foes

to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

growing_wind.name: Growing Wind
growing_wind.description:
Before combat this unit initiates, foes in a
wide area around target take damage equal
to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

blazing_wind.name: Blazing Wind
blazing_wind.description:
Before combat this unit initiates, foes
in an area near target take damage equal
to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

rising_thunder.name: Rising Thunder
rising_thunder.description:

blazing_thunder.name: Blazing Thunder

Before combat this unit initiates, foes

blazing_light.name: Blazing Light

pavise.name: Pavise

sacred_cowl.name: Sacred Cowl

aegis.name: Aegis

defiant_spd_2.description:

At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+5

defiant_res_2.description:

triangle_adept_1.name: Triangle Adept 1

triangle_adept_2.name: Triangle Adept 2
triangle_adept_2.description:
If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk

triangle_adept_3.name: Triangle Adept 3

space.

pass_3.name: Pass 3

obstruct_2.name: Obstruct 2
obstruct_2.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 70%, foes cannot move through

obstruct_3.name: Obstruct 3
obstruct_3.description:

spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with
Pass skills.)

wings_of_mercy_3.name: Wings of Mercy 3

escape_route_2.name: Escape Route 2
escape_route_2.description:
If unit’s HP ≤ 40%, unit can move to a space
adjacent to any ally.

escape_route_3.name: Escape Route 3

vantage_3.name: Vantage 3

desperation_2.name: Desperation 2
desperation_2.description:

seal_def_3.description:

seal_res_1.description:

seal_res_2.name: Seal Res 2
seal_res_2.description:

seal_res_3.name: Seal Res 3

bowbreaker_3.description:
If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a
colorless bow foe, unit makes a guaranteed
follow-up attack and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

breath_of_life_1.name: Breath of Life 1
breath_of_life_1.description:
If unit initiates combat, restores 3 HP to adjacent
allies after combat.

breath_of_life_2.name: Breath of Life 2
breath_of_life_2.description:
If unit initiates combat, restores 5 HP to adjacent
allies after combat.

breath_of_life_3.name: Breath of Life 3

allies after combat.

savage_blow_1.description:

savage_blow_2.description:
